loans.name: Jeannette Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jeannette, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertir en el negocio, realizando la compra de productos para la elaboración de comida en esta época navideña, se comprara, pollo en su mayor parte y tambien condimentos, ya que lo prepara empanizado para venderlo.
Ella considera que estos préstamos le han permitido incrementar las ganancias y fortalecido el negocio, con esto se ha mantenido trabajando, en su familia sus condiciones económicas han mejorado.
texts.en: Jeannette is requesting a new loan to invest in the business.  She will buy ingredients to prepare food for the Christmas season.  She will mostly buy chicken and condiments since she breads it and sells it.  She considers that these loans have made it possible for her to increase profits and strengthened the business; she’s been able to continue working and her family’s economic conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy chicken and condiments.

loans.name: Jose Gilberto

texts.es:
José, tiene 44 años de edad, trabaja en la agricultura sembrando maíz de regadillo, tambien realiza trabajos de albañilería, con estas actividades ha logrado mantener a su familia, lo realiza desde hace 10 años, trabaja en lo propio, aprendió con su padre quien tambien trabaja la tierra.
Actualmente se encuentra realizando la siembra de la temporada, para esto solicita un préstamo para comprarse abono seis sacos y pago de mano de obra, con esto esta aumentado la capacidad en el cultivo, con la aspiración de obtener una buena cosecha.
José tiene el objetivo de mejorar las condiciones de su familia, espera a través del trabajo poder realizarlo, ofreciendo una vida mejor a la familia.
texts.en: José, 44, works in agriculture growing irrigated corn; he also works in construction.  He’s able to support his family with these activities.  He’s been doing them for ten years and works for himself; he learned from his father who also worked the land.  He’s currently doing the planting for this season and needs a loan to buy six sacks of manure and to pay labor costs.  With this, he will increase production capacity hoping to have a good harvest.  José’s objective is to improve his family’s conditions and hopes to accomplish this by means of his work offering his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy six sacks of manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Alberto Mauricio

texts.es:
Alberto, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tambien trabaja en estructuras metálicas, con estas ocupaciones ha logrado tener lo necesario para la familia, aprendió con sus padres, tiene dos años de realizarlo en lo propio, de lunes a sábado de 7:00am a 4:00pm es su horario.
Solicita un préstamo para el pago de mano de obra para poder sacar la cosecha de maíz, tambien pagara por el servicio de una maquina desgranadora, este crédito le brindara lo necesario para realizar la parte final del cultivo.
La aspiración que tiene Alberto es aumentar la capacidad del cultivo, para mejorar las cosechas, tambien quiere tener mejores oportunidades para que las condiciones económicas en su familia sean mejor.
texts.en: Alberto, 28, lives with his wife and two children.  He works growing corn and also making metallic structures.  With these occupations he’s been able to have what’s necessary for his family. He learned from his parents and has been working for himself for two years, Monday through Saturday from 7am until 4pm.  He’s requesting a loan to pay labor costs to gather the corn harvest and also to pay for the use of a threshing machine.  This loan will provide what’s needed for him to complete the final growing phase.  Alberto’s wish is to increase crop yields to improve crops and also to have better opportunities so his family’s economic conditions will be better.

loans.use: to pay labor costs and for a thresher.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
La señora Rosa maría  soltera vive en  Managua Nicaragua trabaja en el área de contabilidad de una empresa desde hace 22 años.

Doña rosa solicita un crédito ya que necesita hacer la inversión de  compra de zinc, perlines ,por que  considera que es necesario el cambio de techo de su vivienda  para mejor las condiciones de su casa de habitación.
Rosa maría espera  se le haga efectivo dicha solicitud de crédito
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosa María is a single woman. She lives in Managua, Nicaragua, and has been working for 22 years as an accountant for a company.

Mrs. Rosa is requesting a loan because she needs to invest in zinc sheets and purlins. She thinks that it is necessary to change the roof of her house in order to improve its condition.

Rosa María hopes to receive this loan.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets and purlins.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia, se dedica a la elaboración de hamacas, vive con sus dos hijos de seis años y cuatro años de edad, ella aprendió el negocio en su familia, a través de sus padres y hermanos lo realiza todo el día, se toma un descanso para poner llevar a sus hijos a la escuela, tiene una experiencia de 10 años.

Ella solicita un préstamo por qué necesita comprarse materiales para la elaboración de hamacas, invirtiendo principalmente en la compra de hilo de seda y también pago de mano de obra para personas que le ayudan a tejer, esto le permitirá salir con algunos pedidos que tiene para otros clientes, ya que la temporada que se acerca salen nuevas demandas de trabajo.

El objetivo de Virginia es trabajar y envía poder lograr la construcción de una vivienda más adecuada para vivir con sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Virginia makes hammocks. She lives with her two children, who are six and four years old. She learned to do hammocks from her family, from her parents and siblings. She works in this the whole day and takes a rest in order to be able to take her children to school. Virginia has been doing this for ten years now.

She is requesting a loan because she needs to buy materials for making the hammocks - especially silk threads - and to pay other people that help her to weave. This will help her finish some orders that she has for other clients, now that the upcoming season has a good demand.

Virginia’s objective is to work and one day, to be able to build a better house for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy silk threads and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with seven children and all of them attend school. She is not looking after additional members of the family.
She has been selling charcoal in the market at retail for five years, working seven days a week. She also collects rent from her houses as additional income.
She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to enable her to stock more sacks of charcoal for sale. Rose's challenges include seasonality and transportation of bags of charcoal. 
Rose's dream is to be able to stock charcoal that fills a lorry and also to become a wholesaler. She lives in her husband`s house with access to electricity and no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Nuru

texts.en:
Nuru lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children and three of them are attending school. She also looks after her sibling.
She has been selling green bananas in the market at retail for ten years, working seven days a week. Nuru does not have any other source of income. 
She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to buy more bunches of  green bananas for sale. 
Nuru's challenges include seasonality. Her dream is to be a wholesaler. 
She joined MCDT because of their interest in working with the low income earning group of people. She stays in her own house without access to either electricity or piped water.  Nuru's major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas

loans.name: Jonave

texts.en:
Jonave is 26 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell like snack foods, sugar, milk, and spices.

Jonave has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from fishing.

Jonave aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell like snack foods, sugar, milk, and spices.

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en: Michelle is 29 years old, married and the mother of four children. Three of her children attend school while she works very hard at her food-making business in the Philippines. She is requesting a loan for PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more of the ingredients she needs to make food. Michelle has been in this business for five years. Her goal for the future is to save enough money to provide for the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-selling business.

loans.name: Srey

texts.en: Srey is 19 years old. She is married and lives with her husband in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a traditional dancer who makes an income of $5 daily. Her husband is employed in a restaurant. He earns about $3 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Srey requests a loan of $1000 to purchase a 'tuk tuk' (motorcycle taxi) for her husband to use to run a taxi service. By doing so, he would generate more income for the family. In the future, Srey would like to run a souvenir shop and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a 'tuk tuk' (motorcycle taxi) for her husband

loans.name: Junifen

texts.en:
Junifen is a responsible father who is raising his family in a rural community. He is 51 years old and has two adult-age children. He aims to improve their poor living conditions in order to give his family a better life. Aside from farming, he also engages in hog-raising business to generate additional income. 

Due to financial difficulty, he aims to improve the business to earn a higher income. In this regard, he is requesting a loan of P18,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising. He is hoping that this loan will help him to make the business viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with five children who are too old to be in school. She is looking after her grandchildren.

Edith has been selling charcoal from door to door at both retail and wholesale prices for six years, working six days a week. She also has rental houses for additional income.

She has requested a loan of UShs 2,000,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more  bags of charcoal for sale. Her challenges include seasonality and late payments. Her dream is to accumulate profits to enable her to build more houses to rent out. She joined MCDT to access credit and save money. She stays in her own house with access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Saroeun

texts.en:
Saroeun (in the photo) and his wife, Ngon, are rice and lotus farmers. Saroeun has previously asked for a Kiva loan (www.kiva.org/lend/353299). He is now asking for another in the amount of 700 USD to continue his farming business by buying seed, fertilizer, and pesticide.

The couple has been married since 1991 and they have four children: two sons and two daughters. All of them are in school. They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.

loans.use: To buy seed, fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Maricris

texts.en: Maricris is 28 years old, married and the mother of three children. She earns a living by growing rice in the Philippines, and is requesting a loan for PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. She has been in this business for three years and earns additional income by running general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Noeun

texts.en: Noeun is 44 years old, widowed and lives with her two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. For the last four years, she has earned a living by sewing clothes at home and earns approximately $8 daily. In order to improve her business, Noeun is requesting a loan for $300 to buy of the more material she needs to make clothing. Her goal is to earn more income for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children go to college and earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to buy cloth to use to make clothing.

loans.name: Kifhly

texts.en:
Kifhly is 34 years old, married, and has two children who attend school.  He lives in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh.  Kifhly and his wife have been buying and selling cosmetics and kitchenware for four years. They buy cosmetics and kitchenware from the Phnom Penh market and sell them in their local market. 

Kifhly is requesting a loan for $1,000, which he will use to buy more cosmetics and kitchenware to sell.  He hopes to expand his business, which he will enable him to earn more income and better support his standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and kitchenware to sell.

loans.name: Victorina

texts.en:
Victorina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a local eatery business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 20 years.

Victorina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients and utensils for her local eatery business.

In the future, Victorina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils for her local eatery business.

loans.name: Merlelyn

texts.en:
Merlelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 11 years.  She earns additional income  from motorcycle transport. 

Merlelyn is requesting a loan from NWTF for 29,500 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant business.  She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF.  She hopes to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her restaurant  business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for his pigs

loans.name: Cenelia Elizabeth

texts.es: La  señora cenelia  es maestra de educación  primaria, está ubicada en el colegio Rural donde se traslada a impartir clases a 25 kilómetros, tiene 19 años de laborar en dicha actividad, es soltera, esta señora tiene la necesidad de construir su vivienda, por  eso decidió visitar  ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento y mejorar las condiciones  y nivel de vida, por el cual merece el apoyo para que realice tan hermoso sueño como es de tener su casa propia y disfrutarla al máximo, agradeciéndole a ceprodel y a los inversionistas de kiva por tan oportuno crédito y por beneficiar a personas de bajos recursos.
texts.en:
Cenelia is an elementary school teacher in a rural school she travels 25 kilometers to for her classes.  She has worked for 19 years in this job and is single.

She needs to build her house so she decided to visit CEPRODEL for a loan to improve her living conditions and standard of living.  She needs support to realize such a beautiful dream as having her own house and enjoying it to the maximum degree.

She's grateful to CEPRODEL and the Kiva lenders for such a timely loan and for benefitting low-income people.

loans.use: to buy beams, metal roofing, cement, sand, doors, windows, red brick, anticorrosive, and thinner, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de enchiladas y tostadas, tiene 54 años de edad, está viviendo con su esposo,  tiene 6 años de estar realizando ventas las cuales hace tres veces por semana de 8:00am a 4:00pm.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de aceite, plátanos, yuca, que son los necesarios para realizar la venta, aparte de condimentos y otros productos que antevienen en la preparación de la venta, su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio, mejorando la calidad de los productos.
La aspiración de María es vivir mejor con su esposo, tener más comodidades y trabajo para superarse.
texts.en:
Maria makes a living selling enchiladas and tostadas. She is 54 years old and is living with her husband. She has 6 years of experience making sales, which she does three times per week from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. 

She requests a loan for the purchase of oil, bananas, and yucca, which are the necessities for her to make sales, aside from condiments and other products that are used in the preparation of her products. 

Her aspiration is to strengthen her business, improving the quality of her products. Maria's aspiration is to live better with her husband, and to have more amenities and work to better herself.

loans.use: To buy oil, bananas, and yucca.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement, tile and metal grilles.

loans.name: Maria Virginia

texts.es:
María, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos, vive con su esposo y en compañía de sus suegros, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, refrescos y pupusas, tiene dos años de estar en este negocio lo aprendido por iniciativa propia y trabaja cuatro días por semana.

Ella solicita un préstamo para invertir al negocio y poderlo fortalecer con frutas frescas para realizar los refrescos también comprara azúcar, dentro de las frutas está la piña, manzanas, sandía, que son las que utiliza para hacer los refrescos naturales este préstamo le ayudará brindándole el dinero necesario para poder fortalecer el negocio.

Su aspiración es con la inversión del crédito poder mejorar sus condiciones económicas en la familia, que le permitan tener trabajo permanente para poder proveer lo necesario.
texts.en: María, 35, is the mother of two children.  She lives with her husband and parents-in-law.  She works selling vegetables, beverages and pupusas [filled, grilled corncakes] and has been in business two years having learned on her own initiative and she works four days a week.  She’s requesting a loan to invest in the business and to be able to strengthen it with fresh fruit to make her beverages; she also wants to buy sugar and among the fruits will be pineapple, apples and watermelon which are the ones she uses to make the natural beverages.  This loan will help her have the necessary money to strengthen the business.  Her hope is that by investing the loan she will be able to improve her family’s economic conditions that will make it possible for her to have permanent employment in order to provide what’s necessary.

loans.use: to buy sugar, pineapple, apples and watermelons.

loans.name: José Isaac

texts.es:
El joven José Isaac vive  en Managua Nicaragua soltero trabaja como lector de medidor  de agua  en una empresa  situada en Managua.

José solicita su crédito  para invertir en materiales de construcción como bloques, cemento, arena para la construcción de un muro en  la parte del frente de su vivienda ya que con esta construcción va a tener mayor seguridad  en su casa de habitación
texts.en:
Young Jose Isaac lives in Managua, Nicaragua.  He is single, and works as a water meter reader for a company located in Managua.

Jose is requesting a loan to invest in construction materials, such as cement blocks, cement, and sand, to build a wall around the front of his house.  By building this wall, he will make his home more secure.

loans.use: to buy cement blocks, cement and sand

loans.name: Guillermo Antonio

texts.es: El señor Guillermo Antonio  vive en Managua  padre de familia   responsable , con muchos deseos de superación para su familia es por eso que hace dicha solicitud de crédito para  invertirlo en materiales de construcción como cemento, piedra cantera , hierro, para  el anexo de un cuarto que necesita para  mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Mr Guillermo Antonio lives in Managua.  He is a responsible father with strong desires to get his family ahead.  For this reason he is requesting a loan that will be invested in the purchase of construction material such as cement, gravel, iron, for the addition of a room to his house which will improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as blocks, cement and sand.

loans.name: Dulamdorj

texts.en:
Dulamdorj is a 48-year-old woman who has three children, ages 14 to 25, and lives with her family in an outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia, without basic infrastructure. Her two daughters attend a local high school, while her son and his spouse work as a machinist and a builder. 

Since 1995, she has been operating a clothing sales business in the second largest outdoor market of Mongolia. She sells a wide range of clothes imported from Beijing and Ereen, a border city of China, where she travels once or twice in a month. 

She is requesting a 1,000,000 MNT loan to purchase more clothes to sell for the upcoming season in order to increase her current working capital.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children and both of them attend school. She is looking after a niece.

Harriet has been operating a clinic for humans for ten years, working seven days a week. She also keeps poultry and practices agriculture for side income.

She has requested a loan of UShs 2,000,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more drugs and replace depreciated equipment. Her challenges include high transport costs and recovering payment from debtors. 

Harriet's dream is to own a bigger clinic and employ nurses and other staff. She joined MCDT because interest charged on loans is relatively low. She lives in a rented house with access to both electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more drugs and replace old equipment

loans.name: Merna

texts.en:
Merna is 37 years old and married with seven children. Merna works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like candies, bread, canned goods, eggs, etc.

Merna has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Merna aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like candies, bread, canned goods, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with two children and both of them attend school. She is not looking after other members of her family. She has been operating a hair salon for seven years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other source of income.

teopista has requested a loan of UShs 2,000,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock synthetic hair, hair oils, chemicals, and skin oils. Her challenges include high electricity tariffs, the unstable power supply, and seasonality. Her dream is to own a big salon. She joined MCDT because she wanted a boost in her capital. She lives in a rented house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more synthetic hair, hair  oils, chemicals, and skin oils

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 40 years old and a business lady, married to Naftali, a businessman. They are blessed with two children. She has been running a retail shop for the past ten years with the monthly income of KES 20,000 which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Rose will use the loan to purchase more stocks of sugar, rice and maize meal for sale. 


With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop and improve the family living standard.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of sugar, rice and maize meal.

loans.name: Arca De Noe Group

texts.es:
La señora Tedis Estela  de 24 años de edad es soltera, tiene una hija de 04 años de edad, vive en casa de un familiar en una  comunidad de Choluteca  al sur de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 08 años al negocio de las golosinas.
Doña Tedis  vende tacos, enchiladas, tajadas, pastelitos y yuca con chicharrón, sus clientes son los estudiantes de las escuelas de la comunidad, vecinos y demás personas que ella frecuenta a diario.
Doña Tedis es una mujer trabajadora y responsable es por tal razón que sus compañeras la eligieron como la líder del grupo y está solicitando el préstamo para compra de repollo, plátano verde y maduro, papas, cebollas, chiles, yuca, harina, pollo y carnes, la cual es la materia prima para elaborar sus golosinas, con el apoyo del préstamo,desea suplir la necesidad de financiamiento para seguir trabajando al igual que sus demás compañeras que necesitan el préstamo para surtir sus negocios.
Doña Norma se dedica a la venta de golosinas.
Doña Mayra se dedica a la venta de pan y tamales.
Doña Eva se dedica a la venta de tajadas de plátano y hojuelas.
Doña Delsy se dedica a la  compra  y venta de ropa nueva, ellas necesitan el préstamo para seguir trabajando y están contentas de seguir con Prisma, sus sueños son mejorar un poco sus condiciones de vida y con las ganancias poder mejorar sus casas.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Tedis Estela is 24 years old and single.  She has a four year old daughter and lives in a family community in Choluteca in southern Honduras.  She has been selling snacks for 8 years.

Tedis sells tacos, enchiladas, tajadas, meat cakes, and yucca with pork rinds.  Her customers are students from the community schools, neighbors, and other persons that she serves daily.

Tedis is a hardworking, responsible woman who was elected leader by her fellow group members.  She is asking for this loan to buy cabbage, green and ripe bananas, potatoes, onions, peppers, yucca, flour, chicken and meats, which she will use to make her snacks.  With the help of this loan, she wants to have the financing to be able to keep working, along with her fellow members who also need a loan.

Norma sells snacks.

Mayra sells bread and tamales.

Eva sells plantain tajadas.

Delsy buys and sells new clothing and needs this loan to be able to work.  They are all happy with Prisma and have dreams of improving their lives, incomes, and homes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Santos Marisol

texts.es:
Santos, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertir en la venta de pupusas, pues considera necesario realizar la inversión en aceite, tomates, salsas, repollo, maíz, condimentos y otros productos para la elaboración de las pupusas.
Ella manifiesta que su experiencia con el crédito anterior fue mejorar el negocio, tener más capacidad para la venta, con las ganancias ha sobresalido en este tiempo con los compromisos del hogar, dándole mejoras en su economía.
texts.en:
Santos requests a new loan to invest in the sale of pupusas*. For this she considers it necessary to make an investment in oil, tomatoes, sauces, cabbage, corn, condiments, and other products for the preparation of the pupusas. 

She says that her experience with the previous credit was to improve her business and have greater capacity for sales. With the profits she has excelled in meeting her commitments at home, making improvements in her economy.

*[A traditional Salvadoran dish made of thick, hand-made corn tortilla filled with a blend of either cheese, vegetables or meat]

loans.use: to buy oil, tomatoes, sauces, cabbage, corn, condiments, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesús, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poderse comprar repuestos para mejorar un vehículo que adquirió para la venta, comprara fricciones, bujillas, discos, que son los que actualmente necesita  hacer las reparaciones.
El tuvo un efecto con el préstamo anterior, fortaleciendo el taller para prestar un servicio mas completo, con las ganancias se ha mantenido trabajando, en su familia no ha enfrentado ningun inconveniente, todo se mantiene igual.
texts.en:
Jesus requests a new loan in order to buy parts to improve a vehicle that he acquired to sell. He will buy clutches, spark plugs, and disks, which are what he currently needs to make the repairs. 

He had an impact from his previous loan, strengthening his workshop to provide a more complete service. With the profits he has continued working, and his family has not faced any problems; everything has been going the same.

loans.use: to buy clutches, spark plugs, and disks.

loans.name: Luisa Veronica

texts.es: La señora Luisa es maestra de educación primaria, impartiendo clases en un colegio de la comunidad donde habita, es soltera con 3 hijos a los que le brinda todo el apoyo en su educación, esta señora presenta una necesidad urgente como es la construcción de techo y pared, por eso visito las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento y poder lograr el objetivo planteado, ya que el mismo será utilizado en la compra de Bloques, Zinc, Cemento y Perlin, de esta manera mejorara sus condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en: Luisa is an elementary school teacher at a local school.  She’s single with three children whose schooling she supports wholeheartedly.  She urgently needs to build her roof and a wall which is why she visited the Ceprodel office to request a loan to reach the desired goal.  It will be used to buy concrete blocks, metal sheeting, cement and roofing purlins.  In this way she will improve her conditions and her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Álvaro Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Álvaro vive en la cuidad de Managua Nicaragua, su núcleo familiar esta compuesto por  tres personas. 

Actualmente trabaja en una empresa de Managua desempeñándose como operador de pozo, con una estabilidad laboral de  15 años.

Alvaro solicita un crédito para mejorar su vivienda y así  bridarle mas comodidad a su familia.

La inversión que don Álvaro quiere hacer es compra de cerámica y cemento para la instalación de cerámica en su vivienda.  
Espera le sea otorgado el préstamo por que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida para su familia
texts.en: Álvaro lives in the city of Managua, Nicaragua; his nuclear family consists of three people.  He currently works for a firm in Managua as a well operator and has been on the job for 15 years.  He’s asking for a home-improvement loan to provide more comfort for his family.  He wants to buy tile and cement to install tile in his house.  He hopes this loan will be granted because he wants to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tile and cement.

loans.name: Hamilton José

texts.es:
Hamilton es soltero, tiene un hijo, al que le brinda el apoyo para su mantención y paga sus estudios. Vive en la cuidad de Managua Nicaragua. 

Se desempeña como cajero en una empresa desde hace dos años; es una persona responsable, con muchos deseos de superación; actualmente habita en casa de sus padres, la cual esta presentando problemas en el sistema eléctrico y necesita cambiar las puertas.

Por ese motivo solicita a CEPRODEL un crédito para la compra de puertas y reparación del sistema eléctrico, su esperanza es poder brindar un techo seguro para su familia.
texts.en: Hamilton is single and has a son who he pays child support for and pays for his schooling.  He lives in the city of Managua, Nicaragua and has been employed as a cashier in a firm for two years.  He’s a responsible person who very much wants to get ahead.  He currently lives in his parents’ house which is having some electrical problems and needs to have the doors replaced.  This is why he’s asking Ceprodel for a loan to buy doors and to repair the electrical system.  His hope is to be able to provide his family with a safe home.

loans.use: to buy doors and to repair the wiring.

loans.name: Aníbal José

texts.es:
El señor Aníbal José vive en la cuidad de Managua Nicaragua trabaja como fontanero en una empresa desde hace 8 años. Casado tiene dos niños.

Aníbal hace la solicitud de crédito ya que quiere hacer un cuarto y repellar las paredes de su vivienda.
El señor hace dicha solicitud para la compra de materiales de construcción como bloques, cemento  para  la construcción  de un cuarto para sus niños y asi mejorar las condiciones y comodidades de su familia
texts.en:
Aníbal José lives in the city of Managua, Nicaragua.  He has worked as a plumber in a business for eight years.  He's married and has two children.

Aníbal's applying for a loan because he wants to build a room and plaster the walls of his house.  He's requesting the loan to buy construction materials such as cinder blocks and cement to build a room for his children and improve his family's conditions and comforts.

loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, sand, and metal roofing

loans.name: Maria Lisseth

texts.es: María es una mujer emprendedora, además de ser Licenciada en Matemáticas,  Profesión que utiliza como medio de vida, ya que imparte clases de educación secundarias en un instituto del sector donde vive, también ejerce la actividad comercial como es la venta de fritanga los fines de semana en su casa, en busca de otros ingresos y poder tener un nivel de vida más cómodo, es soltera con 2 hijos a los que le está dando apoyo para su desarrollo académico, actualmente esta   presentando una necesidad de mejorar el porche, cocina y embaldosar  piso, los que están en mal estado, por esa razón visito  ceprodel para solicitar un crédito y comprar  cemento, cerámica, hierro, bloque y mano de obra. Y realizar la obra que tanto anela.
texts.en:
Maria is an enterprising woman who also has a degree in mathematics.  She earns a living by practicing this profession, teaching high school classes in an institute in the neighborhood where she lives.  In addition, she has a business selling fried foods from her house on the weekends, because she seeks additional income so that she can have a more comfortable standard of living.  She is single, and has 2 children whom she is supporting in their education.  

At this time, she needs to make some improvements to her porch, kitchen, and tile floor, which are in poor condition.  For this reason, she visited CEPRODEL to request a loan that she will use to pay for cement, tile, steel, cement blocks, and labor.  This way she can carry out this work that she wants done so much.

loans.use: to pay for cement, tile, steel, cement blocks, and labor

loans.name: Johanna Del Carmen

texts.es:
Johanna es una mujer con un profundo amor al prójimo, por eso se preocupa por la enseñanza de los demás, ella imparte clases en un instituto del sector donde vive, es licenciada en español y atiende a jóvenes de educación secundaria, es soltera con 2 hijos en edades escolares, y estudian en el lugar donde habitan. Se presento a ceprodel a solicitar financiamiento para seguir mejorando su vivienda, como es pared y techo, lo que comprara cemento, tierra, arena, alfajillas y mano de obra. 

Para realizar tan importante obra, ya que con la posibilidad económica que presenta ha venido efectuando en el tiempo mejoras a su vivienda, y por ende las condiciones y nivel de vida de su familia, y que es la única manera para realizar los avances en el mejoramiento mismo.  

  .
texts.en:
Johanna is a woman with a deep love for others. That is why she cares about educating others. She gives classes at an institute in the area where she lives. She has a bachelor's degree in Spanish and teaches secondary school students. She is single with 2 schoolage children and they go to school where they live. She went to Ceprodel to ask for a loan to keep doing home improvements, such as on the walls and roof. She will buy cement, dirt, sand, beans and pay for labor. 

To do such important work, this financial opportunity has helped. She has made home improvements and therefore her and her family's quality of life. This is the only way she has been able to do these improvements. 
  .

loans.use: to pay for cement, soil, sand, beams, and labor.

loans.name: Jose Ignacio

texts.es:
Jose, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él se dedica a la fabricación en un taller de estructuras metálicas, este negocio nació gracias al estudio obtenido con familiares y la práctica la realizó con un tío en un taller, desde hace 10 años está realizando este trabajo y de forma propia lo realiza hace cinco años.

En solicita un préstamo para poderlo invertir en la compra de una cortadora y pulidora, que son herramientas necesarias para poder tener una buena funcionalidad en el taller, este crédito ayudará a realizar una buena compra solventando el problema e inconvenientes que se le presenta al momento de realizar su trabajo, con esto podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio.

Su aspiración es mejorar la calidad de vida en su familia a través de su trabajo realizado en el taller.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his wife and son.  He makes metal structures in his shop.  This business started thanks to the training that he obtained in his family and the practice that he had with an uncle in his shop.  He has been involved in this type of work for 10 years, 5 years formally.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy a cutter and buffer, which are necessary equipment to be able to have good functionality in the shop.  This loan will aid in the making of a good purchase which will resolve the problems and inconveniences that he currently faces in performing his work and will allow him to provide better service.

His goal is to improve the quality of life of his family through the work at his shop.

loans.use: to purchase a cutter and buffer.

loans.name: Gerson

texts.es:
El señor Gerson tiene 28  años de edad es casado, vive en su casa ubicada en una comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 10 años al negocio de elaboración de hamacas,  sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trabajo y buenos precios.
Don Gerson tiene su pequeño taller en su casa, con la ayuda de su esposa elaboran  las hamacas que sus clientes les encargan, a demás el trabaja como bombero en una empresa camaronera por la noche.
Don Gerson está  solicitando el préstamo de 10,000.00 lempiras para la  compra de hilo de seda, cabuya, agujas y tijeras que son la materia prima para elaborar las hamacas, con el apoyo de este préstamo desea suplir la necesidad que tiene actualmente de material para elaborar las hamacas y está muy contento de seguir trabajando con Prisma.
Don Gerson su sueño es seguir trabajando y mejorando más  su negocio para  el futuro poder construir su propia casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre del 2012.
texts.en:
Gerson is 28 years old. He is amrried and lives in his house loacted in the community of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. For ten years he has worked in the business of making hammocks. His customers prefer him because of his good work and good prices.

Gerson has his little workshop in his house. With his wife's help, they make the hammocks that his customers order from He also works nights as a firefighter at a shrimp company. 

Gerson is asking for a loan of 10,000.00 lempiras to buy silk thread, rope, needles and scissors taht are the raw materials to make the hammocks. With the support of this loan, he wants to fill the need he has now for materials to make the hammocks and he is happy to keep working with Prisma.

Gerson's dream is to keep working and improving his business so that in the future he can build his own home. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November, 2012.

loans.use: to buy silk thread, rope, needles and scissors for his business.

loans.name: Noel

texts.es:
El señor Noel Josué vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja.Es carpintero casado con tres personas a su cargo  con dos hijos a su cargo.

Noel solicita crédito a nuestra institución para la compra de materiales de construcción ya que quere hacer la construcción de un baño para mejorar sus condiciones de vida para su familia.

La inversión va hacer para la compra de tubo , bloques, cemento , y pago de mano de obra
texts.en:
Noel Josué lives in the city of Managua. He works as a carpenter. He is married and has three dependents, two of whom are children. 

Noel is asking for the loan to buy construction materials since what he wants to do is build a bathroom to improve his family's quality of life. 

He is going to make the investment to buy pipes, blocks, cement and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Davaatseren

texts.en:
Borrower Ms. Davaatseren is married and 49 years old. She is an entrepreneur at the second largest outdoor market of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. She lives with her husband and daughter in a small apartment. Her spouse is a driver at a local bus company, while their daughter works as a chemist at Oyu Tolgoi LLC. 

Now it is the high shopping season, and Ms. Davaatseren wants to purchase a variety of shoes to sell.

loans.use: to purchase shoes to sell for upcoming season

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en: Due to the hardships of living, Analiza engages in hog-raising to supplement her husband's income. She is 31 years old and has three children. She and her husband want to improve their standard of living so that they can educate their children and give them a better life. With this in mind, Analiza wants to raise more pigs to sell, but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional of 15,000 PHP to buy feed, vitamins, and additional pigs to raise. She believes that this loan will help her to improve the business and hopes that she will make the business more viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional pigs to raise

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 40 years old, married, and has three children.

Geraldine is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Geraldine requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Geraldine has been raising pigs for eleven years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva to sustain her business.  

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stocks of sugar, rice, and maize meal

loans.name: Florence's Group

texts.en:
"Florence's group is comprised of 2 hard working women. Florence is 21 years old and lives in the town of Wobulenzi in the Luwero region of Uganda. She is single and has 4 children, 2 of them currently in school. For the past 6 years, Florence has been working hard to manage her small pig business, in which she rears pigs. 

To help expand her business, Florence has requested a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more animals such as goats, and will help Florence to generate greater profits and expand on the business. Florence hopes that in the future she will be able to start a poultry farm. 

Florence is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more animals such as goats

loans.name: Renilda

texts.en:
Renilda is 41 years old, married, and has 4 children who are in school. Renilda works very hard to provide for them.

Renilda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like soft drinks, eggs, soap, canned goods, etc.

Renilda has been in this business for 11 years.

In the future Renilda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like soft drinks, eggs, soap, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elías, administra un negocio en la venta y crianza de ganado vive con su esposa tiene dos hijos que estudian el bachillerato, él trabaja para poder mantener el hogar y obtiene sus ganancias en el negocio cuando comercializa el ganado, este negocio lo inició desde que era joven aprendiendo con su familia al mismo tiempo realizando los cultivos de maíz y frijol, actualmente cuenta con dos vacas un toro y dos terneros.

Él solicita un préstamo para comprar ganado lechero dos vacas para poder aumentar la producción de leche y elaborar lácteos, Este préstamo será una gran ayuda ya que aumentará su número de ganado lechero con el que puede trabajar mejor.

Su aspiración es que sus dos hijos menores sean profesionales y culminan sus estudios, salgan adelante y pueda mejorar su condición, en su negocio de ganadería y tener un terreno donde poder criar mejor el ganado.
texts.en:
Elías runs a business raising and selling cattle. He lives with his wife, and they have two children who are in high school. He works to be able to maintain his home, earning money in his business when he sells the cattle. He started this business when he was young, learning from his family while at the same time growing corn and bean crops. He currently has two cows, one bull, and two calves. 

He is requesting a loan to buy two dairy cows so he can increase his milk production and make dairy products. This loan will be a big help since having more dairy cattle will enable him to improve his work.

His aspiration is that his two children will be professionals and finish their educations so they can get ahead. He also aspires to improve the condition of his cattle business and to have a plot of land where he can better raise his cattle.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El señor juan carlos vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja en una empresa  en el área  de contabilidad.

El señor visito nuestra oficina para solicitar un crédito ya que necesita el  dinero para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc  perlines para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Pero  también una parte del dinero que CEPRODEL  le financie lo utilizara en la compra de medicamento para su hijo.
.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan Carlos lives in Managua and works at a company in the area of accounting

He has visited our office to request a loan because he needs money to purchase construction materials such as metal roofing to improve his living conditions.  Also, part of the money received from CEPRODEL he will use to buy medicines for his son.


.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as blocks and cement and to purchase medicine.

loans.name: Maura Gioconda

texts.es: Maura es una persona ejemplar en su comunidad, de profesión maestra de educación primaria, labora en un colegio del sector donde vive, es casada con 1 hijo al que le está dando todo el apoyo  para su desarrollo  académico, esta señora visito las oficinas de ceprodel para exponer la necesidad de financiamiento y poder cubrir la misma , de construir una cocina y crear mejores condiciones de vida, ya que dicho desembolso será utilizado en la compra de Bloques, Zinc, Cemento, Perlin, Arena, Hierro, Alambre de Amarre y Puertas,  esta señora merece el apoyo que ceprodel le ha brindado ya que el sector laboral a que pertenece es de un salario bajo y requiere del apoyo de créditos, para  poder ir  mejorando sus  niveles de vida.
texts.en: Maura is an upstanding community member and a local high school teacher of elementary education. She is married and has one son for whom she provides all academic assistance. She came to the Ceprodel office to explain her financial need to meet these education expenses, to build a new kitchen, and to improve her living conditions. This loan will be used to buy blocks, cement, sand, iron, wire ties, zinc, beams, and doors. She is deserving of Ceprodel's help because she earns a low salary and needs the loan to raise her living standard.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, sand, iron, wire ties, zinc, beams, and doors.

loans.name: Roberto Eliseo

texts.es:
El señor Roberto Eliseo  vive en Managua Nicaragua trabaja como supervisor de calidad y control del agua potable desde hace 13 año.

Esta solicitando su tercer crédito para hacer cambio de techo en su vivienda ya esta en mal estado.

 De aprobarle el crédito Roberto va a comprar zinc y perlin y pago de  mano de obra.   y así aprovechar la oportunidad de mejorar su vivienda  para darle a su familia las comodidades necesarias y adecuadas
texts.en: Roberto Eliseo lives in Managua, Nicaragua and has been employed as a supervisor of quality and potable water control for 13 years.  He’s requesting his third loan to replace the roof on his house which is in poor condition.  If his loan’s approved, Roberto will buy metal sheeting and roofing purlins and will pay labor costs thus taking advantage of the opportunity to improve his house and give his family adequate and necessary comfort.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Ermelis De Los Angeles

texts.es: Ermelis habita en una zona rural, hija de padres pequeños productores, la que con mucho esfuerzos emprendió sus estudios, logrando graduarse en la especialidad de   licenciatura en Español, la que hoy ejerce impartiendo clases en un colegio del sector donde vive, con 19 años de efectuarlo, como maestra de educación primaria, es soltera con 2 hijos con estudios primarios y secundarios a los que le brinda la atención para lograr el desarrollo académico, esta señora se presento a ceprodel a exponer la necesidad de mejorar su vivienda y ser beneficiada con un financiamiento el que lo utilizaría para la compra de cemento, hierro, zinc, ladrillo bloque y cerámica, para la construcción de cuarto y reparación de cocina, de esa manera mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ermelis lives in a rural zone.  She’s the daughter of small farmers and with much effort was able to start her schooling and succeeded in graduating with a Bachelor’s degree in Spanish and today works teaching classes in a school near where she lives; she has 19 years’ experience as an elementary school teacher.  She’s single with two children attending elementary school and in secondary school.  She cares for the so that they will develop academically.  She came by Ceprodel to express her need to make some home improvements and to be graced with a loan that she’ll use to buy cement, rebar, concrete blocks and tile to add a room and to repair the kitchen thus improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Missimahou Group

texts.fr: "MISSIMAHOU" est un groupe de quatre personnes, dont les membres sont des amis et vivent dans le même quartier. Le représentant du groupe, David (qui a la main levée sur la photo), est marié à Justine, une marchande. David  est âgé de 47 ans et vit au Bénin. David n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Le couple à trois enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. David vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble avec leurs enfants les diverses charges familiales. David est agriculteur depuis près de dix neuf ans. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, David désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver de la tomate, du piment et du maïs. David ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe "MISSIMAHOU",sollicite un quatrième financement auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: "MISSIMAHOU" is a group of four people who are friends and live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, David (who has his hand raised in the photo) is married to Justine, a merchant. David is 47 and lives in Benin. He did not attend school. He and his wife have three children, some of whom are in school, all of whom are under their care. David lives with his wife and children. He, his wife, and their children, share the family responsibilities. David has been a farmer for 19 years. With the goal of strengthening his farm and satisfying customer demand, David wants to buy supplies for cultivating tomatoes, peppers and corn. David and his fellow MISSIMAHOU group members are requesting a fourth loan from ALIDe. They paid back their previous loans on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for cultivating tomatoes, peppers and corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more textiles to make dresses and gowns

loans.name: Saranchimeg

texts.en:
Saranchimeg is a 47-year-old married entrepreneur who lives with her family in a ger, a traditional Mongolian felt tent, in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, which is an area without basic infrastructure. Her husband works at a court organization while their children attend local university and high school. 

Saranchimeg has supported her family since 1999 by operating a children's clothing business and a grocery store. Currently, she sells clothes at the second largest outdoor market of Ulaanbaatar city. December is a very busy shopping month, so entrepreneurs need more products or working capital after December of each year. 

Saranchimeg is requesting a 600,000 MNT loan to purchase more clothes to sell for the upcoming season in order to increase her working capital. She is a very trusted client of Transcapital Co Ltd.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell in the upcoming season

loans.name: Nune

texts.en: Nune lives in Shahumyan village with her husband and 19-year-old son. Nune's financial source is a small store, where she sells different kinds of accessories, decorations, and flowers. Her husband receives a retirement pension and Nune is the only worker in the family. She has applied for the loan to purchase supplies for her shop. She plans to increase the turnover in her trade business gradually. This will raise the income, which Nune will use to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for flowers, accessories, and decorations

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a 51-year-old business lady and married to John a business man. They are blessed with three children. She has been a tailor for the past ten years with the monthly income of 20,000 KES. which she uses to support her family. She is applying for her 1st loan term with KADET LTD after being introduced to a credit officer.  

Ruth will use the loan to buy more stock of textile materials and a sewing machine. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. 

Her hopes and dreams are to open a boutique shop and improve the family's living standard.

loans.use: to buy more stock of textile materials and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is 41 years old and now a widow. Despite this, she has the strong determination to improve her family's living in order to give her children a better life. 

To generate income, Lorena is engaged in the cooking and selling of meals and snacks in her community. She aims to improve the business in order to generate sufficient income to continue sending her children to school. 

Lorena is requesting capital of 10,000 PHP to buy soft drinks, raw ingredients and seasonings needed in cooking meals, and snacks for sale. Lorena believes that this loan will help her to improve the business and she is hoping that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, raw ingredients and seasonings needed in cooking meals, and snacks for sale.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen, 36. is married and blessed with three children, ages 13, 10 and 6 years old. She is in the dairy business and sells milk in Kapsabet. Her business has been in operation for two years and she earns an income of KES 15,000 monthly.

She is seeking her first loan of KES 30,000 from KADET LTD and intends to use this amount to pay the milk suppliers.  

The profits earned will be used to repay the loan and for her upkeep. She hopes for a bright future.

loans.use: To pay the milk suppliers.

loans.name: Felistas

texts.en:
Felistas is 32 years old and single. She runs a boutique in Nairobi town where she sells new clothes, hand bags, shoes etc. She has been doing this for three years now and earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES.

This will be Felistas' first loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy clothes, handbags and shoes for resale. In the future, she wants to open another business selling groceries.

loans.use: To purchase new clothes, handbags and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cereals like maize and beans in bulk for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a hair dryer, shoes and hand bags for resale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 60 years old, married and a father of three children. He operates a shop where he sells new clothes and also second-hand jackets. Joseph has been in this business for four years and gets a monthly income of 70,000 KES.

This will be Joseph's first loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to buy clothes and jackets for resale. In the future, he wants to be a successful business man.

loans.use: To buy new clothes for resale.

loans.name: Crescenciana

texts.en:
Crescenciana is a 48 year old married woman and a mother of seven children from Talibon, Bohol in the Philippines. She owns a tricycle transport business. Her husband works as a driver for their tricycle. She is also engaged in a hog-raising business.

Crescenciana is asking for a loan to buy fuel for the tricycle and an additional piglet to raise. Crescenciana dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fuel for the tricycle business and an additional piglet to raise.

loans.name: Battur

texts.en:
Borrower Battur is a 35-year-old married man who lives with his wife and 12-year-old son in a small apartment. He works at a local flour company, while his son attends secondary school. 

The toilet and kitchen of the current apartment in which the family lives is very old and really needs some renovation. 

For this reason, he is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase necessary housing/construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase necessary housing/construction materials for renovation.

loans.name: Maria Ana

texts.es:
La señora María es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora, vive  con  su  esposo  y  sus 3  hijos en una comunidad al sur de Honduras.
Doña María su negocio es la venta  de sandia, el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de sandias. Con  el  crédito  ella espera tener más producto que ofrecer para cubrir los pedidos que  recibe de sus clientes que son muy buenos.
Doña María con los ingresos obtenidos  desea mejorar un poco su situación económica y la de su familia.  En el futuro espera que su negocio crezca gracias a la inversión hecha en el mismo y sueña con ver a sus hijos realizados y convertidos en persona de bien y con mejores oportunidades.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Noviembre del  2012
texts.en:
María’s a very responsible, honest, hardworking person living with her husband and three children in a community in south Honduras.  María’s business is selling watermelons and needs the loan to buy them.  She hopes with the loan to have more product to offer and to fill customer orders she gets that are very good.  With income earned, María wants to improve her family’s economic situation a bit.  In future, she hopes her business will grow thanks to the investment made in it and she dreams with seeing her children fulfilled and become upstanding citizens with better opportunities.

Choluteca, Honduras - November, 2012

loans.use: to buy watermelons.

loans.name: Ritza

texts.es:
La joven Ritza  es una persona muy emprendedora, honesta y trabajadora, vive  con  su  esposo  y  sus 2  hijos  al sur de Honduras.
Doña Ritza tiene un negocio que es la venta  de sandia. El préstamo lo necesita para la compra de sandias y  con  el préstamo ella espera tener más producto que ofrecer para cubrir los pedidos que  recibe de sus clientes. 
Doña Ritza con los ingresos obtenidos desea mejorar su situación económica y  la de su familia. En el futuro ella espera que su negocio siga creciendo., gracias a la inversión hecha en el mismo, y
Doña Ritza sueña con ver a sus hijos  grandes  y convertidos en persona de bien y con mejores oportunidades en la vida.


Choluteca, Honduras –  Noviembre del  2012
texts.en:
Ritza is a very enterprising, honest, hardworking young woman living with her husband and two children in southern Honduras.  She has a business selling watermelon and needs the loan to buy them.  She hopes with the loan to have more product to offer and to fill customer orders.  Ritza will use income earned to improve her and her family’s economic situation.  In future, she hopes her business will continue to grow thanks to the investment made in it and she dreams with seeing her children all grown up and become upstanding citizens with better life opportunities.

Choluteca, Honduras - November, 2012

loans.use: to buy watermelons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La señora Norma de 35 años de edad, vive con su esposo y tiene tres hijos que depende de ella, vive en su casa que esta ubicada en la ciudad de San Lorenzo en la parte sur de Honduras,  se dedica a la actividad  que es la venta de abarrotería, desde hace 05 años, los clientes son sus  amigos y vecinos de la comunidad donde ella vive.
Doña Norma  es una mujer trabajadora con mucha ganas de sacar adelante a su familia, también se dedica a la venta de leña y pan.
Doña Norma está solicitando el préstamo para compra de frescos, pescado, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, galletas, jugos, leche, huevos y pan. Con el apoyo del préstamo invertirá más en su negocio y espera obtener mejores ganancias,  que las utilizara  para seguir invirtiendo y de esa manera salir adelante.
Doña Norma su sueño es seguir trabajando, mejorando su negocio y también seguir  mejorando su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Norma, 35, lives with her son and three dependent children in their house in the city of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has owned a grocery story for five years. Her customers are friends and neighbors. Norma is hardworking and wants to provide for her family. She also sells wood and bread. 

She is applying for a loan to buy fresh foods, fish, sugar, rice, beans, cookies, juices, milk, eggs, and bread. The loan will let her invest in her business, and she expects to make a better profit so that she can keep investing and growing. Her dream is to continue working, expanding her business, and improving her house.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods, fish, sugar, rice, beans, cookies, juices, milk, eggs, and bread for her business.

loans.name: Missimide 4 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "MISSIMIDE 4", est composé de cinq personnes qui sont des amis et vivent dans le même village. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. Le représentant du groupe, du nom de Assanni est celui qui a la main levé sur la photo. Assanni est âgée de 52 ans et vit au Bénin. Assanni est marié Kounoumé, une marchande. Le couple à dix enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés, et  dont huit sont à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble avec leurs enfants les diverses charges familiales. Assanni n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Assanni depuis vingt huit ans exerce comme activité l’agriculture. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Assanni veut acheter des intrants pour cultiver du piment, du maïs et du manioc.Pour ce fait Assanni, sollicite ensemble avec les autres du  groupe "MISSIMIDE 4" l’appui de ALIDé.
texts.en: The "MISSIMIDE 4" group is made up of five people who are friends and live in the same village. This is the first time that the group has requested financial support from ALIDe. Their goal is to improve their businesses. The group representative, Assanni, is pictured raising his hand in the photo. He is 52 and lives in Benin. He is married to Kounoumé, a merchant. The couple has ten children, some of whom are in school, eight of whom are under their care. They and their children share the family responsibilities. Assanni did not go to school. For 28 years he has worked as a farmer. In order to provide customer satisfaction, Assanni wants to buy supplies for cultivating peppers, corn, and cassava root. In order to do so, he and his fellow MISSIMIDE 4 group members are requesting the support of ALIDe.

loans.use: to buy supplies for cultivating peppers, corn, and cassava root.

loans.name: Gf Mahukpego Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "GF MAHUKPEGO" est formé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et habitent le même village. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Bernice, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Bernice est âgée de 44 ans et mariée un cultivateur du nom de Phillipe. Bernice n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble avec leur enfants les diverses charges familiales. Il y a vingt  ans que  Bernice exerce comme activité l’agriculture. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Bernice désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du maÏs, du gombo et du piment. Bernice s'approvissionne dans un marché du Bénin. Bernice ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe "GF MAHUKPEGO" désire obtenir un cinquième financement auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The "GF MAHUKPEGO"  group is made up of three people who are friends and live in the same village. The group representative, Bernice, is pictured raising her hand. She is 44 and married to a farmer named Phillipe. She did not attend school. She and her husband have four children, some of whom are in school, all of whom are under their care. The family shares the family responsibilities. For 20 years, Bernice has been a farmer. With the goal of improving her farm and better responding to customer demand, Bernice wants to buy supplies for cultivating corn, gumbo, and peppers. Bernice gets her supplies in a market in Benin. She and her fellow GF MAHUKPEGO group members want to get a fifth loan from ALIDe. Their previous loans were paid back well.

loans.use: to buy supplies for cultivating corn, gumbo and peppers.

loans.name: "mignonmide 7" Group

texts.fr: "MIGNONMIDE 7"est un groupe de quatre personnes, dont les membres sont des amis et  vivent dans un même village. Le représentant du groupe, Pierre1 (qui a la main levée sur la photo), est marié à Pauline, une marchande. Pierre1 est âgé de 47 ans et vit au Bénin. Pierre1 n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Le couple à sept enfants, dont certains sont  scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Pierre1 vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble avec leurs enfants les diverses charges familiales. Pierre1 est agriculteur depuis près de vingt deux ans. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Pierre1 désire acheter des intrants pour cultiver du piment et du maïs. Pour ce fait Pierre1, sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe "MIGNONMIDE 7" un premier financement auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: "MIGNONMIDE 7" is a group of four people who are friends living in the same village. The group representative, Pierre1 (who is raising his hand in the photo), is married to Pauline, a merchant. Pierre1 is 47 years old and lives in Benin. He did not attend school. The couple has seven children, some of whom are in school, all of whom are under their care. Pierre1 lives with his wife and children. The couple and their children share the family responsibilities. Pierre1 has been a farmer for 22 years. In order to improve his business and satisfy his customers' demand, Pierre1 wants to buy supplies for cultivating peppers and corn. In order to do so, he and his fellow MIGNONMIDE 7 group members are requesting their first loan from ALIDe.

loans.use: to buy supplies for cultivating peppers and corn.

loans.name: Zaieryl

texts.en:
Zaieryl is from Ubay, Bohol and is a 24 year old married woman and a mother of a five year old child. She has been engaged for two years in a fishing business together with her husband. This is the source of their income.
Zaieryl is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets, lead weights, and seaweed seedlings. With this loan she will be able to improve her fishing and seaweed farming business. 
In the future, Zaieryl dreams of expanding her business and making it sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, and seaweed seedlings

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
Shiela is 32 years old, married and has three dependent children. She is from Garcia-Hernandez, Bohol and has operated a fishing business for 13 years now with her husband. This is the only source of their income. 
Shiela is requesting a loan to buy fishing equipment such as nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets. With this loan, she will be able to improve her fishing business. 
In the future, Shiela dreams to expand her business to meet the daily needs of her family and support the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment such as nets, lead weights, hooks and buckets.

loans.name: Ansumana's Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust is very pleased to present to you this group of teachers from eastern Sierra Leone. This group of hard working and dedicated teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org base in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone to request a loan of 11,100,000 Leones for the entire group. With the help of this loan, each of these teachers will be able to meet his immediate financial needs and at the end of each month, he will repay the loan, using his monthly salary. The bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayment on behalf of each teacher. 

Bundu is the featured leader of this group. The 54 year old is a native of Maforni. He is married to a trader and the couple has 6 children – 3 in primary school and 3 in secondary. Bundu has been in the teaching profession for 14 years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy house construction materials like iron corrugated zincs, cements, boards, etc. for the construction of a dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy house construction materials like iron corrugated zincs, cement, boards, etc. for the construction of a dwelling house

loans.name: Prosperite 2 Group

texts.en: Celestine, age 51, is married and has 3 children, ages 18 to 31.  She has 1 child currently attending school. She is representing the Prosperite 2 group. Celestine has a store where she sells car parts and motor oil. Car mechanics frequent her shop for supplies. She has had this business for 3 years. She will use the loan to buy more car parts and motor oil. Her business strategy is to offer helpful and friendly customer service. She has received 4 previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good payment record. She hopes to continue to grow and have a large business.

loans.use: to pay for assorted car parts and motor oil.

loans.name: Noel

texts.fr: Noel est une dame âgée de 40 ans, mariée et mère de 06 enfants. elle mène une activité de vente des ustensiles de cuisine depuis 06 ans dans un marché de la ville. elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. elle voudrait ce crédit pour acheter des marmites, casseroles, des cuvettes et des poelles pour renforcer son stock de marchandises afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. les revenus générés lui permettront d'aider son mari à mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille
texts.en: Noel is 40 years old, married and the mother of 6 children. She has sold kitchen utensils for 6 years in a market in town. She has a good level of experience in the area. She would like this loan for the purchase of pots, saucepans, bowls, and pans in order to increase her stock of merchandise and satisfy customer demand. The income generated from this will allow her to help her husband to better provide for the family's needs.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La Joven Nilda es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora, soltera vive con su madre  en una comunidad de Choluteca al sur de Honduras. 
Nilda su negocio es la venta de golosinas,  y el  préstamo lo necesita para la compra de pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa interior, faldas, vestidos y suéteres, que es otra de sus actividades. Con el préstamo ella espera  que sus ventas aumenten debido a que contara con más capital  fresco para esta temporada y poder satisfacer  a sus  clientes.
Nilda  desea que su situación de  vida y  la de  familia mejore con esta inversión, sueña  que a un corto plazo  su negocio este posicionado como  la glorieta y tienda más  grande y  reconocida de su sector  y poder seguir apoyando a  su familia.


Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre   2012
texts.en:
Nilda’s an honest, responsible and hardworking person.  She’s single living with her mother in a community in Choluteca in southern Honduras.  Nilda’s business is selling snacks and needs the loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, skirts, dresses and sweaters for another one of her activities.  She hopes with the loan that sales will increase because she’ll have more fresh capital for this season and she will be able to satisfy customer demand.  Nilda hopes her and her family’s life situation will improve with this investment.  Her short-term dream is that the business will be well-positioned as the best-known snack stand and biggest, best-known store in her sector to continue supporting her family.


Choluteca, Honduras - November, 2012

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Iris

texts.es:
La señora Iris tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su esposo y tiene cuatro  hijos que dependen  de ella,  vive en su casa que esta ubicada en la ciudad de San Lorenzo en la parte sur de Honduras, se dedica a la actividad de venta de tortillas desde hace 06 años, sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos de la comunidad donde ella vive. 
Doña Iris  es una mujer trabajadora con mucha ganas de sacar adelante a su familia. Esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña y cal. Con el apoyo del préstamo ella va invertir más en su negocio y tendrá mejores ganancias,  que las utilizara  para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y de esa manera salir adelante con su familia.
Doña Iris su sueño es mejorar su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Iris, 32, lives with her husband and four children who depend on her.  She lives in her house located in the city of San Lorenzo in the southern part of Honduras.  Her activity has been selling tortillas for the last six years; her customers are friends and neighbors from the community where she lives.  
Iris is a hardworking woman who very much wants to move her family forward.  She’s requesting the loan to buy corn, firewood and lime powder.   With support from the loan she’s going to invest more in the business and will have higher profits that she’ll use to continue investing in the business to get ahead with her family.  Iris’ dream is to make some home improvements.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November, 2012

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime powder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase household items at wholesale

loans.name: Prosperite 3 Group

texts.en: Gertrude, age 45, is a single mother of 2 children, ages 15 and 18. Both of her teenagers are attending school. She is representing the Prosperite 3 group. Gertrude sells clothing in a local market and has been operating this business for over 10 years. She has gained many valuable customers over the years. She will use the loan to buy more clothing to sell. Her business strategy is to keep a large variety of clothes available for her customers. She has received 4 previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a good repayment record. She wants to begin importing clothes for her business in the future. She hopes her children will continue in their studies and work in business like her.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of five grown children from Ubay, Bohol. She has been involved in fishing for 30 years together with her husband. She's also involved in another business which is food vending for a year now. This is the source of their income. 

Rosenda is requesting a loan to have additional income to buy more fish and pigs.  In the future, Rosenda hopes to expand her two business to meet the needs of her family and for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more fish and pigs

loans.name: Dorjdulam

texts.en:
Borrower Dorjdulam is a 41-year-old receptionist at a cafe. She lives with her son, daughter, and spouse in the outer ger district which lacks basic infrastructure. 

Recently, Dorjdulam bought a very old house and this loan will be used for renovation of this house. She is requesting a 3900000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) loan to purchase necessary housing materials.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase maize and beans for sale

loans.name: Katherine

texts.en:
Katherine is a 26-year-old married woman and a mother of five young children. She is from Talibon, Bohol. She earns a living by selling cosmetics and other beauty products like lotion, make-up kits, perfume and other personal items. She has been in the business for almost six years now.

Katherine is asking for a loan to buy additional cosmetics and beauty products to sell. 

Katherine dreams of making her business a success in the future and saves money for the future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional cosmetics and beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Muloma Association Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are teachers of the Muloma Association from the eastern city of Kenema. This  group of teachers have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org based in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, to apply for a loan of 500,000 Leones for each in the group. 

With the help of this loan, each of these borrowers will be able to add more inventories in their respective businesses. This will lead to more sales, more profit and improvement in their standard of living.

Baindu is the featured leader of this group. A native of Kailahun, the 32-year-old is married to a trader and the two have three children, one in primary school and two in secondary. 

Baindu has been a businesswoman for many years now. She sells ready-to-wear clothes and has been running this type of business for many years now. With the help of this loan, she is going to buy a large number of ready-to-wear clothes to add to her current ones.

loans.use: to buy a large number of ready-to-wear clothes to add to her current ones.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
