loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Nehema Group

texts.en:
Nehema Group is located in Lugari District.  It is a group of 13 women and 5 men led by Sarah pictured on the right with her hand raised. She is receiving an input loan for ½ an acre of maize and sorghum cultivation. Sarah joined One Acre Fund during the Long Rains 2012, and is now enrolling in the Long Rains 2013 season.  Sarah joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer. Sarah also thinks that One Acre Fund will be able to help her.

Sarah described her harvest as very good last year as a One Acre Fund farmer and hopes for another good year in the 2013 Long Rains season. Her biggest concern is sending her children to school. She plans on using future profits from the harvest to support her children’s studies.  Additionally, she would like to help the needy in the village and continue being a One Acre Fund farmer.  For the 2013 Long Rains season, Sarah’s group members will take input loans of ½ an acre each.  In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 9 acres of land.

Beatrice and Annah chose to drop from Nehema Group after the Kiva photo was taken.  They are still pictured above.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y ganado, vive con su madre, no tiene hijos, trabaja sola realizando las actividades agropecuarias a toda hora del día, se levanta desde las seis de la mañana para poder realizar todo lo que conlleva la crianza de cerdos y ganado, esto lo aprendió de su madre.

Solicita un préstamo para comprarse concentrado para alimentar los cerdos y ganado esto le ayudará para tener un el alimento necesario para engordar los animales y luego que sean comercializados su objetivo es trabajar para poder tener una fuente de ingresos en el negocio, mejorando cada día esta actividad.
texts.en:
María makes a living raising pigs and livestock.  She lives with her mother and has no children.  She works alone doing her agricultural activities at all hours of the day.  She gets up at six in the morning to be able to do everything entailed in raising pigs and livestock, which she learned from her mother.

She's requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed for her pigs and livestock.  This will help her have the necessary food to fatten the animals for sale.

Her goal is to work to be able to have a source of income from her business, improving her work every day.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed

loans.name: Telma Agustina

texts.es:
La señora Telma  de 53 años de edad es casada, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 06  años al negocio de venta de ropa nueva como pantalones, blusas, ropa interior de adultos y niños, su negocio está ubicado en una comunidad San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Doña Telma es una señora muy trabajadora y luchadora con deseos de sacar adelante a su familia.
Doña Telma está solicitando el préstamo para compra de ropa nueva como pantalones, blusas, ropa interior, faldas, vestidos, calzonetas, calcetines, suéteres  etc. con el apoyo de este préstamo espera mejorar un poco su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida, con las ganancias podrá invertir más en su negocio. 
Doña Telma está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma, su sueño es tener un buen negocio y seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Telma, 53, is married and lives with her husband and her two children in her own house.  She has made a living for six years selling new clothing such as pants, blouses, and underwear for adults and children.  Her business is located in the community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras.  Telma's a very hardworking woman who strives to get her family ahead.

Telma's requesting a loan to buy new clothing such as pants, blouses, underwear, skirts, dresses, underpants, socks, sweaters, etc.  With the help of this loan she hopes to improve her business somewhat and, consequently, her quality of life.  With the profits she'll be able to invest more in her business.

Telma's very happy to continue working with Prisma.  Her dream is to have a good business and continue working to get her family ahead.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, November 2012

loans.use: to buy new clothing for her business

loans.name: Utkir

texts.ru: Уктиру 19 лет. Он молодой, энергичный и приятный молодой человек. Уктир учится на 2 курсе Таджикском Государственном Университете в факультете Информатика и технология. Среди однокурсников Уктир имеет хороший статус и уважение. Он очень любит читать зарубежную литературу. В свободное время он занимается спортом. Особенно он играет футбол. Уктир еще не женился и живет с родителями. Зарплата его родителей не хватает оплатить за учебу в университете и поэтому он запрашивает займ. Он надеется на вашу доброту. Давайте, ему поможем стать хорошим  специалистом и таким образом осуществить его заветную мечту!
texts.en: Utkir is 19 years old.  He is a young, energetic and pleasant young man.  Utkir is a second year student at Tajik State University in the department of Computer Science and Technology.  Utkir has a good reputation and respect among his classmates.  He loves to read foreign literature.  In his free time he plays sports.  He especially likes soccer.  Utkir has not married yet and lives with his parents.  His parents' salary is not enough to pay for his studies at the university and because of this he is asking for a loan.  He hopes for your kindness.  Let's help him to become a good specialist and realize his cherished dream!

loans.use: to pay for his tuition

loans.name: Haraya

texts.en:
Haraya is 25 years old and married with 2 children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Haraya runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store like eggs, sardines, bread, soft drinks, etc. Haraya has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future, Haraya would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store like eggs, sardines, bread, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Golden

texts.en: Meet Golden, a businessman who is 48 years old. He runs a Zoona mobile money transfers shop in his hometown of Mansa. Golden started running his mobile money transfers shop three years ago. He says his business is the safest and cheapest way in which people can move their monies from one place to another. He is very pleased with his business because he has seen it grow in transaction value. He believes he has been able to stay in business because he is financially disciplined. Golden says his biggest challenge is that the phone he uses to make the transactions runs out of connectivity. This slows down the business. Golden is hopeful that once the Kiva loan comes in, he will be able to increase his working capital and make more profit so that he can purchase a new computer to make his transactions quicker. Golden says this loan will go a long way towards boosting his business. He thanks the Kiva lenders. In the video, a representative from Zoona interviews Golden.

loans.use: To increase his mobile money transfer working capital

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a sewing and peco machine for a tailoring business

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom attend school. She is not looking after any additional members of the family.

Mariam has been selling charcoal in the market at wholesale and retail for ten years, working seven days a week. She does not earn any additional income. She has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT-SACCO to enable her to purchase more bags of charcoal to sell. 

Mariam's challenges include seasonality of supply and transportation. Her dream is to be able to collect the charcoal from the village herself. She joined MCDT because she needed a hand in raising capital for her business. She stays in a rented house without access to both electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Jeramie

texts.en:
Jeramie is a 30-year-old married woman and mother of six children from Talibon, Bohol. She and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for several years now. 

Jeramie is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and buckets. Through this, her husband will be able to enhance his daily catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and buckets.

loans.name: Emmanuel Musa's Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers in the eastern city of Kenema. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of 6,500,000 SLL for the entire group. With the help of this loan, this group of teachers will be able to meet their immediate financial needs and at the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries. Their school’s bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf. 

Emmanuel is the leader of this group. A native of Sienga in eastern Sierra Leone, Emmanuel is 39 years old. He is married to a trader and the couple has four children--two in secondary school, one in college, and one not attending school. Emmanuel has served in the teaching profession for 14 years now. With the help of this loan, he is going to buy electrical equipment to electrify his house and then use the remainder of the loan to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy electrical equipment to electrify his house and then use the remainder of the loan to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is a 26-year-old married woman and a mother of a one-year-old child from Ubay, Bohol. Haide works together with her husband in their rice field.
Haide hopes to make her business a success but lacks the financial resources to do so. She is asking for a loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for the plants. With this, they will be able to grow and produce a good harvest from the field.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Munga

texts.en:
Munga is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya and runs a fabrication shop which has been in service for twelve years. He is the sole owner of the business. He is a married father of four children. In this business, he makes doors, windows, grills and other welding work. 

Despite the effect of unpredictable seasons and high cost of raw materials, Munga aspires to own hardware. Munga learnt of Milango from his friends and is applying for a loan of 41,900 Kenya shillings to buy plates, square cubes, bars, welding rods, scrap metal to make doors, windows, and grills.

Munga believes the additional income from this loan will help him purchase a compression machine for tire repair and spraying paint.

loans.use: To buy plates, square cubes, bars, welding rods, scrap metal.

loans.name: Jarri Alexis

texts.es:
El joven Jarri de 25 años de edad es soltero, vive en casa de su madre, en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 03 años al negocio de venta de achinería, en su motocicleta se desplaza todo los días por las mañanas a diferentes barrios y colonias de San Lorenzo y lugares aledaños para ofrecer sus productos, sus clientes le prefieren por amabilidad y buen trato.
Jarri está solicitando el préstamo para compra de juguetes, aretes, pulseras, anillos, cadenas, lápices y ganchos de pelo, con el apoyo de este préstamo el pretende suplir la necesidad  de financiamiento para surtir su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Jarri su sueño es  tener su casa propia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Jarri is a young woman of 25 and single. She lives in her mother's house, in the community of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has had a business selling miscellaneous items for three years. 

Every day in the morning, she goes around on her motorcycle to various neighborhoods of San Lorenzo and adjacent areas to sell her products. Her customers prefer her for her friendliness and good service.

Jarri is requesting a loan to buy toys, earrings, bracelets, rings, chains, pencils and hairpins. With the help of this loan she intends to meet the need for financing to stock her business, and improve her quality of life.

Jarri's dream is to have her own home. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: To buy toys, earrings, bracelets, rings, chains, pencils and hairpins.

loans.name: Carmen De Jesus

texts.es:
Carmen, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para seguir trabajando y ampliando su negocio, el objetivo es invertir en la compra de ropa nueva, camisas, camisetas, pantalones, para poder continuar ofreciendo a los clientes variedad de mercadería.

Con su préstamo anterior considera que logró ofrecer una mayor gama de productos, con los que logró generar mejores ganancias para poder solventar las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen has decided to get another loan to continue working and expanding her business.  Her goal is to invest in buying new clothing--shirts, t-shirts, and pants--so she can continue offering her customers a variety of merchandise.

She thinks that with her previous loan she managed to offer a greater range of products, with which she generated more income to cover her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy shirts, t-shirts, and pants

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгуль 23 года, замужем. У них с мужем одна замечательная дочка.  Назгуль с мужем в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2010 году начала заниматься полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 30,000 KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Назгуль в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется корова, 5 баранов и один трактор.Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Назгуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и детали для трактора. Трактор необходимо подготовить для весенних пахотных работ. Доходы от кредита Назгуль планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством покупки дополнительных голов скота и для улучшения материального благосостояния семьи. Основная цель Назгуль это вырастить дочку и дать ей хорошее образование.
texts.en: Nazgul is 23 years old and is married.  She and her husband have one wonderful daughter.  With her husband, Nazgul started farming and raising livestock in 2010 as a source of income for their family, starting this business with a sum of 30,000 KGS.  Thanks to Nazgul's hard work on her farm, today they have a cow, five rams and one tractor.  Monthly income from their holdings is around 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products.  With the goal of further growing her business. Nazgul turned to "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) to purchase one cow and tractor parts.  It's necessary to prepare the tractor for the spring plowing.  Nazgul plans to use the profits from the loan to invest into growing her business by buying additional heads of livestock and for improving the material well being of the family.  Nazgul's main goal is to raise her daughter and to give her a good education.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and tractor parts

loans.name: Makoka Group

texts.en:
Salum, who is in his early 20s, is single. He has been running a business of motorcycle transportation, known as bodaboda, for three years now. He works from 5am to 11pm daily and he is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to buy spare parts for his motorcycle and repair his family house, and he has paid his loan successfully. He requesting the new loan to proceed with his house repairs. His dream is to one day be able to open a motorcycle spare parts shop. 

He will share this loan with his loan group "Makoka," which totals 15 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to proceed with his house repairs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a cow for her husband's dairy business.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children and all of them attend school. She is looking after her old parents. She has been operating a hair salon for five years, working seven days a week. She does not have any other source of income.

She has requested a loan of UGX 600,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock synthetic hair, hair oils, cream relaxers and skin oils. Her challenges include high electricity tariffs and seasonality. Her dream is to own a fully stocked beauty salon. She joined MCDT because she wanted a boost in her capital. She stays in a rented house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more synthetic hair, hair oils, cream relaxers and skin oils

loans.name: Samali

texts.en:
Samali lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children and all of them attend school. She is also looking after her parents.

She has been operating a retail shop for basic commodities for eight years, working seven days a week. She also sells tap water for more income. She has requested a loan of UGX 1,000,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more sugar, rice, soda, salt, Irish potatoes, and flour to sell. Her challenge includes seasonality. Her dream is to own a big shop. She joined MCDT because she did not have another source for more capital. She stays in a rented house with access to electricity but no piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, rice ,soda, salt, irish potatoes and flour

loans.name: Nazareth Group

texts.en:
Tasiana, who is in her early 30s, is married with three children (two boys and a girl). Two of the children are in school and the remaining one is a baby. For the period of one year now, Tasiana has been running a fried chicken business. She works from 2 pm to 10 pm daily and she is able to make a fair profit per month.

She is requesting her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to repair her family house and to cover household expenses and she has paid back her loan successfully. She is requesting the loan to buy more chickens to resell to more customers. Her dream is to one day be able to improve her business to have a better life. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Nazareth", which totals 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more chickens to resell.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a married woman from Ubay, Bohol. She and her husband are actively involved in rice farming for more than a year now. Jasmin gives her best to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family.

Jasmin is asking for a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and pesticides for the farm. With this, they will be able to improve their harvest and yield from the farm.

In the future, Jasmin hopes of improving their way of living and experience fullness of life.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Mutie

texts.en:
Mutie lives in Mariakani area of Coast province, Kenya. He is a father of two children, the last one still in school. He owns a second hand clothing shop.

He learnt about Milango through a friend who invited him and he joined a group with the aim of accessing credit to improve the business operations. The challenge he is facing is price fluctuations.
 
Mutie is applying for a loan of 31,450 Kenya shillings to expand his business by buying some clothes to sell such skirts, trousers, blouses, etc. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to help pay school fees for his child. His future plan is to purchase a piece of land and build a rental house for more income to support the family.

loans.use: To buy some clothes for the business such as skirts, trousers, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Umeda

texts.ru: Умеда женщина в возрасте 28 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Умеда  торгует на рынке детской и женской одеждой.   В течении  5 лет она работала в магазине продавщицей. Позже ее мать поддержала ее  с финансовой стороны  и она открыла свой небольшой магазин.    Муж Умеды   находиться в Российской Федерации.  Старший сын учиться в школе, а младшие ходят в детский сад.    Умеда на полученный кредит хочет привезти новый ассортимент женской и детской одежды.  Она очень благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Umeda is a 28 year-old woman.  She is married and has three children.  Umeda sells children's and women's clothing at a market.  She had worked as a salesperson at a store for five years.  Then, her mother provided her with financial support, and Umeda opened her own small store.  Umeda's husband is in the Russian Federation.  The oldest son attends a school, and the youngest go to a kindergarten.  Umeda wants to use this loan to bring in a new selection of women's and children's clothing.  She is very grateful to Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to bring in a new selection of women's and children's clothing

loans.name: Kubanych

texts.ru: Кубаныч 49 лет,женат, у них с женой один сын.Кубаныч имеет среднее образование, по характеру очень спокойный, приветливый .Кубаныч в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2010 году начал заниматься полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кубаныч в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 дойные коровы, 5 баранов и лошадь.Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кубаныч обратился в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и ремонт сарая. Доходы от кредита Кубаныч планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством закупа дополнительных голов скота копит на свадьбу сына в будущем году.
texts.en: Kubanych is 49 years old, married and he and his wife have one son.  Kubanych has a secondary education.  He is very calm and friendly.  To provide a source of income for his family, Kubanych became involved in farming and animal husbandry since 2010, having started this business with a sum of 10,000 KGS.  Thanks to Kubanych's hard work, today his business contains two dairy cows, five sheep and a horse.  The monthly profit from the business amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS) from sales of milk and dairy products.  In order to further develop his business, Kubanych requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a cow and repair a barn.  He plans to invest the earnings from the loan into developing his business by buying additional heads of livestock and save for his son's wedding next year.

loans.use: to buy a cow and repair a barn

loans.name: Kodirjon

texts.ru: Кодирчон, мужчина в возрасте 58 лет.   К сожалению он развелся с женой и  имеет только одного сына.   Сын учится в восьмом классе.    В свободное от учебы время он помогает отцу.    Кодирчон  единственный кормилец в семье.Он  работает сварщиком. Он очень хороший специалист в своем деле. Занимается этим с 23 лет.   Кодирчон, берет кредит для приобретения материала для сварки.   Он очень благодарен  организации Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Kodirjon is a 58 year old man.  Unfortunately he is divorced from his wife and has only one son.  His son is studying in eighth grade.  In his free time he helps his father.  Kodirjon is the sole provider in the family.  He works as a welder.  He is a very good expert in his field.  He has been doing this since he was 23 years old.  Kodirjon is taking out a loan to acquire materials for welding.  He is very grateful to Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase materials for welding

loans.name: Emmie

texts.en:
Emmie, 34 and single, is a mother of four children. The youngest child is 6 months old and the older ones are 3, 5 and 13 years old. They stay with Emmie at home in the Sinkor community; only three of them are in school. 

Emmie sells chicken and raw fish. She sells ten hours a day. She makes a profit when she sells because she always has cassava fish and bonnie fish to meet the demands of her customers. She has been in this business for  the past sixteen years. She transports her goods by means of a commercial vehicle.  

With the continued help from the lenders towards her business, Emmie is so grateful to them. Emmie learned to sell from her sister, starting with the small amount of $5000 LRD (five thousand Liberian dollars) that she received from that sister. 

Emmie is requesting a loan to purchase more cartons of raw fish, bonnie fish, and chicken for the business. Her plan for the future is to become a big business woman.

loans.use: to purchase more cartons of raw fish, bonnie fish, and chicken for the business.

loans.name: Mirzohaydar

texts.ru: Мирзохайдар родился  1992 года. После окончания школы советом родителей он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет Политики и Бизнеса. Данное время является студентом 3 курса. Он очень способный молодой человек. Мирзохайдар увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает зарубежную литературу.  Родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в университете. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университет. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте вместе поможем молодому специалисту окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en: Mirzohaydar was born in 1992.  After finishing school, according to his parents' advice, he got accepted to the Tajikistan State Politics and Business University.  At this time, he is a third-year student there.  He is a very capable young person.  Mirzohaydar likes sports and reads foreign literature in his free time.  His parents are unable to pay for his studies at the university.  He is requesting this loan to pay for this university education.  He relies on your kindness.  Let's help this young specialist together to finish the university and apply his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: to pay for his studies at the university

loans.name: Mahabat

texts.ru: Махабат 38 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Махабат имеет среднее образование, после окончания школы сразу вышла замуж. По характеру очень хороший человек. Имеет хорошие отзывы от соседей. Они её любят и поддерживают. Махабат в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, в 1998 году начала заниматься полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 5,000 KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Махабат в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова,  ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 13,000 сом (KGS) от продажи молока и молочных продуктов и дополнительно от полеводства. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Махабат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и 4 овец. Доходы от кредита Махабат планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством покупки дополнительных голов скота. Забота о детях и обеспечение хорошего образования для них, это приоритетная задача для Махабат и её мужа.
texts.en: Mahabat is 38 years old, married and a mother of three children.  She has a secondary education and got married right after finishing school.  She is a very good person.  She has good references from her neighbors.  They love and support her.  To provide a source of income for his family, Mahabat became involved in farming and animal husbandry in 1998, having started this business with a sum of 5,000 KGS.  Thanks to her hard work, today her business contains one cow, and the monthly profit from the business amounts to about 13,000 som (KGS) from sales of milk and dairy products and also from farming.  In order to further develop his business, Mahabat requested a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a cow and four sheep.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into developing his business by buying additional heads of livestock.  Taking care of the children and providing them with a good education is the primary goal for Mahabat and her husband.

loans.use: to buy a cow and four sheep

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Точинисо  работает в сельской больнице акушеркой и у неё большой стаж работы.   Она мать 4х детей, её муж  пенсионер и дополнительно работает на заводе.   Семейные условие на среднем уровне и   они хотят провести мероприятие по поводу рождения внука.    По обычаю у них проводят большое мероприятие и они  копят на такие мероприятия много сбережений.  Но то что она накопила пока не хватает поэтому   Точинисо обратилась в организацию  Арванд.    Она хочет получить у нас круглую сумму на подарки для внука и частично погашать его.     Она очень благодарна Арванд за финансовую поддержку .
texts.en: Tojiniso works as a midwife at a village hospital and has a lot of work experience.  She is a mother of four children, her husband is a retiree and additionally works at a plant.  Their family conditions are average, and they want to hold an event to celebrate the birth of their grandson.  Traditionally, a big event is held for this occasion, and people save a lot of money for these events.  Unfortunately, Tojiniso has not saved enough money for this yet.  This is why she came to Arvand.  She wants to obtain a large amount from us for the gifts for the grandson and repay the loan partially.  She is very grateful to Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy gifts for her grandson

loans.name: Umirzok

texts.ru: Умирзок пришел в МДО Арванд , что бы получить кредит для покупки скота. Он занимается откормом и куплей продажей коз и овец. Из-за нехватки корма  он вынужден был продать свой скот. Теперь ему нужны деньги, что бы купить коз и корм для скота. Зимой он будет пасти скот, что бы весной смог продать подороже. Его родители нигде не работают поэтому он должен обеспечивать своих родителей. Также весной он хочет жениться, и для этого он должен накопить определенную сумму. Он будет очень благодарен, получить  кредит для приобретения скота и корма.
texts.en: Umirzok came to MDO Arvand to get a loan for the purchase of livestock.  He raises and buys and sells goats and sheep.  Because of lack of feed he was forced to sell his livestock.  Now he needs money to buy goats and feed for the livestock.  In the winter he will shepherd the livestock so that he can sell it in the spring for more money.  His parents do not work and because of this he needs to provide for them.  Also, he would like to get married in the spring and he needs to save a set sum for this.  He will be very grateful to get a loan for the purchase of livestock and feed.

loans.use: to buy goats and feed

loans.name: Dustmurod

texts.ru: Дустмурод родился 1994 года. Он очень умный и способный молодой человек. После окончания школы он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет Политики и Бизнеса в факультет Бухгалтер и аудит. Данное время он является студентом 1 курса. Он активно участвует во всех мероприятиях университета и достоин уважения. Его преподаватели хвалят его за его труд и порядочность и говорят: «Он один из лучших наших студентов». Его родители получают маленькую зарплату, и не в состоянии оплатить за учебу Дустмурода. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте вместе поможем молодому специалисту окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en: Dustmurod was born in 1994.  He is a very smart and capable young man.  After finishing school he enrolled in Tajik State University of Politics and Business in the department of Accounting and Auditing.  Right now he is a first year student.  He actively participates in all university events and deserves respect.  His teachers praise him for his work and decency and say: "He is one of our best students."  His parents earn a small salary and are not able to pay for Dustmurod's education.  He is asking for a loan to pay for his university studies.  He is waiting for your kindness.  Together let's help the young specialist to finish university and use his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia lives in the Mariakani area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is a married mother of four children. She owns a fruit stall which she has been operating for two years. In this business, Sophia sells greens and fruits. The family also earns some income from rental houses.

Sophia learned about Milango Financial Services through a Milango employee. She joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve the business operations. 

Sophia is applying for a loan of 41850 KES (Kenya shillings) to buy greens and fruit (e.g. tamarind, avocadoes, vegetables). The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to expand the business and pay for her children’s school fees. Her plans for the future are to start other businesses and to open stalls in different areas.

loans.use: to buy greens and fruit (e.g. tamarind, avocadoes, vegetables) for sale.

loans.name: Mohamed P.'s Group

texts.en:
This group of teachers from the eastern city of Kenema has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva to apply for a loan of 8,800,000 Leones for the entire group. 

With this loan, the teachers will be able to meet their immediate financial needs and at the end of each month, they will repay the loan using their monthly salaries.  Their school’s bursar (person in charge) is responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

Mohamed, 45, is the leader of this group.  A native of Blama, in eastern Sierra Leone.  He is married and has five children.  Two are in secondary school and the others attend college.  Mohamed has been a teacher for 20 years.  With the help of this loan, he will pay school/college fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school/college fees for his children.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet lives in Kampala, Uganda with her three children, all of whom attend school.  She also looks after her parents, sister and brother.
 
Annet has been selling local brew from home at wholesale and retail prices for ten years and works seven days a week.  She also sells cooked food as another source of income.

She has requested a loan of UShs 600,000 from MCDT- SACCO to buy more jerrycans (containers) of local gin for sale.  Her challenges include seasonality and transportation.  Annet's dream is to expand her business and make more profits. 

She joined MCDT because there was no one else who was ready to lend her money for her business. She stays in a rented house with access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more jerycans of local gin

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya.  He is a hardware store owner.  His business has been in operation for fifteen years. Thomas is married and the father of four school children. 

He joined Milango two years ago to access credit for business expansion.  Thomas is applying for a loan of 83,450 Kenya shillings to buy hardware stock like, bicycle spare, bolts, welding rods and paint.  Besides this business, Thomas is also employed.  The main challenges to both businesses are high transportation costs and bad debts. 

Thomas’s future aspiration is to sell retail and wholesale products and he believes that he can run the businesses fairly.  He also wants to buy a transportation machine from the extra income from this loan.  He is happy about the investment and he knows this will help him provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare, bolts, welding rods and paint.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane, age 28, sells utensils.  With the loan, she wants to offer customers more saucepans and flasks for sale. 

She is married to a technician.  With the profits, she will buy a house.

loans.use: to offer customers more saucepans and flasks for sale.

loans.name: Mtvarisa

texts.en:
Mtvarisa lives in Martvili District. She is 44 years old, married, and lives with her husband, Zviad, and three children (19, 13, and 12 years old).  Mtvarisa is unemployed at the moment. 

The source of income for the family is an agricultural business. In particular, they grow nuts on the family-owned land and sell the harvested products locally. In addition, Mtvarisa has a milk cow and produces cheese with the received milk. 

Mtvarisa and Zviad decided to start their business because their existing income wasn't enough for the family and their living conditions are poor. Mtvarisa's loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provisions of business start-up and restartup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. 

Mtvarisa has noticed that there is high demand for fish in the market. In response to the local market demand, she has requested credit to finance the costs of constructing a dam, which she will build in her garden. She will purchase local species of fish and raise them in a pond. Beginning in the spring season, the fish will start to spawn, then they can be intensively sold. 

Mtvarisa expects that development of the fish farm will raise the income of the family. Part of the increase in income will be reinvested in the same business and the other part will be used for improving the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to start a fish farm.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, who lives in Ubay, Bohol with her family, earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business. She has four grown up children, and her husband works as a fisherman.

Gloria is requesting a loan to buy more stocks to sell in her store such as noodles, canned goods, soda, chips and snack foods. With these purchases, she will be able to attract and cater to more customers, therby augmenting her sales and income. In the future, Gloria aims to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her store like noodles, canned goods, soda, chips and snack foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy three sound towers and an audio console.

loans.name: Antonio De Jesus

texts.es:
Antonio, tiene la necesidad de realizar una nueva inversión, ya que continúa realizando algunas actividades agrícolas y también invertirá en la comercialización de ropa, comprará abono, herbicidas, y también blusas, ropa interior, pantalones, para fortalecer el negocio y la variedad de prendas de vestir.

El manifiesta que la inversión con el préstamo anterior, le permitió mejorar la realización de cultivo y sus cosechas, el realiza actividades de agricultura normalmente y en los días feriados se dedica a comercializar ropa, de estas dos actividades ha logrado salir adelante con su familia ofreciéndoles una condición de vida digna.
texts.en:
Antonio needs to make a new investment, as he continues to carry on some agricultural activities, and will also invest in his clothing sales business. He will buy fertilizer and herbicides, as well as blouses and pants in order to build up the business and increase the variety of clothing articles.

He says that the investment with the previous loan allowed him to improve his farming and his harvests. Normally he farms, and on public holidays sells clothing. From these two livelihoods he has managed to help his family move forward, providing them a decent quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, herbicides, as well as blouses underwear and pants to sell.

loans.name: Annarita

texts.en:
Annarita lives in the Changamwe area of Coast province, Kenya.  She is a married and the mother of three children; two who are of school going age. 

She owns a green grocery stall and has been operating it for four years.  The challenges she is facing are bad debts and high costs of transport.  

Annarita sells greens, fruits, vegetables, cereals etc.  The family also earns some income from the spouse's employment.

Annarita learned about Milango through a friend and joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve the business operations.  She is applying for a loan of 52,300 Kenya shillings to buy vegetables, fruits, cereals etc. 

The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to expand the business and pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, cereals etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, salt, rive, palm oil, for the business.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is a 45 year old married mother of six children, from Bohol, Philippines. 

She earns a living by selling home-cooked foods to others. 

Marietta is asking for a loan to buy additional ingredients for her food vending business like sugar, flour, margarine, cooking oil and more.

With the loan, she will be able to cook and sell more food and increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Yvonne

texts.en:
Yvonne is 25 years old.  She is married and has one child. 

With the loan, she wants to buy rice, sugar and beans to resell.  

The profits will be used to reinvest in a similar business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and beans to resell.

loans.name: Sohail

texts.en:
Sohail is an active and very hardworking member of Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. 

He is 42 years old and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with his family.  Sohail is a father of two school-age sons.  His wife is a responsible housewife. 

Sohail has been going through a very challenging period of his life as the household and children's educational expenses are very high and he is his family's sole bread-winner.  Since 2005, Sohail has owns a small stationery shop in the market.  

He has requested a loan of 100'000 from BRAC Pakistan to purchase a photo copier for his stationery shop as well as some stationery supplies like pens, books, paper, staplers, rims etc as well.  This will gradually result in the increase of his net income. 

Sohail and his wife dreams for a better future of their sons.  He is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a photo copier for his stationery shop as well as some stationery supplies.

loans.name: Jacques

texts.en:
Jacques, 23, sells phones and accessories. He would like to buy more phones and accessories to resell.   

With the profits, he plans to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy more phones and accessories.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa, 42-year-old resident of Sinkor and a high school graduate, is a hardworking mother of four lovely children between the ages of 15 and 22, all attending school. She has been selling rice, milk, sugar, candy, coffee, bath soap, toothpaste, etc. for the past nine years, working 12 hours a day in order to help her husband with the expenses of the family. Theresa learned this business from her mother. She transports her goods by taxi.

Theresa is requesting a loan to purchase more candy, coffee, bath soap, toothpaste, and sugar for the business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more candy, coffee, bath soap, toothpaste, and sugar for the business.

loans.name: Wendy Vanessa

texts.es:
Wendy, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para poder realizar la compra de un paquete de ropa, del cual le están ofreciendo a bajo precio y podrá adquirir mejores ganancias al comercializarla, el fardo de ropa comprada usada en ella viene blusas, vestidos, pantalones, faldas.

Ella considera que las compras que ha realizado a través de los préstamos han sido de gran importancia para fortalecer el negocio y poder ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad con esto ha logrado obtener la fuente de trabajo y velar por las condiciones económicas y su familia.
texts.en:
Wendy has decided on a new loan so that she can purchase a package of clothing, which is being offered to her at a low price. She will be able to get better profits on selling it. The bundle of used clothing includes blouses, dresses, pants and skirts.

She considers that the purchases she has made through the loans have been of great importance in building up the business, and have enabled her to offer her customers greater variety. With this she has managed to obtain a source of work, and be responsible for her family and their financial circumstances.

loans.use: To buy blouses, dresses, pants and skirts.

loans.name: Esmeralda Yaneth

texts.es:
Esmeralda, quiere seguir cultivando maíz y pipián a través del sistema del regadío, por eso solicita préstamo el cual quiere invertirlo en la compra de abono, herbicidas, semilla, éstos materiales son los que usa generalmente para poder proteger  y fortalecer la producción.

El considera que trabajando con estos préstamos ha realizado el trabajo y de la cosecha ha logrado pagar sus deudas, cubrir las necesidades del hogar, su familia ha mantenido el número de miembros, sigue con un deseo de seguir realizando los cultivos en su terreno y comprarse una herramienta que se llama achicadora que es utilizada para realizar la siembra.
texts.en:
Esmeralda wants to continue cultivating corn and pipián (type of squash) through an irrigation system. For this reason she is requesting a loan which she wants to invest in the purchase of fertilizer, herbicides and seed. These materials are ones generally used to protect and strengthen the production.

She believes that by working with these loans, she has done the work and the harvest and managed to pay off her debts and cover the household expenses. Her family has remained together with a desire to continue farming on the land. She hopes to buy an "achicadora" which is used to sow seeds.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides and seed.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is 35 years old. She sells different items in the boutique. She would like to get this loan to enable her to buy more rice, sugar, salt, and maize flour for sale. With the profits from the business, Joyce plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, and other goods to sell in her store.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José esteban  vive en la cuidad de Managua  capital de Nicaragua;Casado  con dos niños menores a su cargo en edad escolar. 

José esta solicitando crédito a nuestra institución por que quiere hacerles mejoras al la parte delantera de su vivienda lo considera necesario por para darle mayor seguridad a su familia.
 Si le otorgamos el crédito el señor va a comprar 
Bloque cemento arena y madera.
Este seria el segundo crédito   trabajado y esta bien agradecido por que con su primer crédito lo invirtió   en  algunas mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
José Esteban lives in the city of Managua, the capital of Nicaragua. He is married, and has two school-aged children in his care.

José is requesting a loan from the institution because he wants to make improvements to the front of his home. He considers these necessary to provide greater safety for his family.

If granted the loan, he is going to buy cement blocks, sand and wood. 

This would be his second loan, and he is very grateful, because he used his first loan to make several improvements to his house.

loans.use: To buy building materials.

loans.name: Jose Obdulio

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder continuar realizando la siembra de maíz, él quiere comprarse los materiales como el abono, herbicidas para las plagas, insecticidas, que son utilizados para poder realizar el trabajo en agricultura.

Con el préstamo anterior logró obtener una buena producción, con ella ha logrado realizar ventas y generar ganancias para cubrir otras necesidades y  está con sus familiares mejorando, tiene una mejor comodidad a través del desarrollo de su trabajo.
texts.en:
José has decided on a new loan so that he continue growing corn. He wants to buy materials such as fertilizer, herbicides for crop diseases, and insecticides, which he uses so that he can carry out his farming work. 

With the previous loan, he succeeded in getting good production. With this, he has managed to make sales and generate earnings to cover other necessities; and his family's situation is improving. He enjoys more comfortable living conditions by means of the work he does.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es:
El señor Roger  es originario del municipio de San Juan de Limay vive en  una comarca aledaña, ubicada en la zona este  a 12 km de distancia del municipio, su núcleo familiar está compuesto por su esposa y tres hijos quien tiene el deber de darles manutención y estudios 

Su profesión,  es ser comerciante donde tiene más de 8 años de experiencia en su trabajo, Posee una pequeña pulpería donde vende productos de abarroterías a personas de su comunidad.

 Don Roger a demostrado ser una persona honesta y trabajadora pagando en tiempo y forma sus créditos anteriores,  recientemente se le visito y nos solicito un nuevo crédito para surtir su negocio en la compra de azúcar, gaseosas, arroz y aceite, donde piensa aumentar sus ingresos cada día a través del crédito hasta establecer un negocio con muchos productos de venta, lo que le permitirá obtener un mayor ingreso y poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia
texts.en:
Sr. Roger is originally from the town of San Juan de Limay, but currently lives in a neighboring region that is located 12 kilometers away. His family consists of his wife and three children, so he must be able to support them and provide for their education.

Roger is a merchant and has more than eight years of experience in this line of work. He has a small store where he sells grocery products to people in his community.

Don Roger has demonstrated that he is an honest and hardworking individual. He repaid his previous loans on time. Roger recently visited CEPRODEL and requested a new loan so that he could restock his business by purchasing sugar, sodas, rice, and oil. He plans to increase his earnings each day, so this loan will enable him to establish a business that has many products to sell. As a result, he will be able to earn more income and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sugar, sodas, rice, and oil.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Modo

texts.fr: Modo est une dame âgée de 55 ans, veuve et mère de 0 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 08 et 29 ans et parmi lesquels 03 vont à l'école. comme activité, elle dispose d'une vente à emporter dans un quartier de la ville de 04 ans environ. elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. elle voudrait avec ce crédit acheter quelques casiers de boissons pour renforcer son stock de marchandises afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. cela va également augmenter son chiffre d'affaire. les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille devenus assez lourds depuis le décès de son époux.
texts.en: Modo is a woman of 55 years old who is a widow and mother of several children between the ages of eight and 29 years old. Three of her children currently attend school. Modo has been running a small takeaway shop in a neighborhood of her city for the past four years. She is able to benefit from her experience in the running her shop. She wants to use this loan to purchase several crates of bottled drinks. This will allow her to increase her stock of goods and better meet customer demand. She will also be able to increase her income in this way. The income Modo earns with the help of this loan will allow her to better meet the needs of her family, which have become rather burdensome since the death of her husband.

loans.use: to purchase several crates of bottled drinks for resale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is a widow with three children who completed school. She is not looking after additional members of the family. She has been selling drinks in a shop at retail for ten years, working seven days a week. She is also operating an eating place as an additional source of income.

She has requested a loan of UGX 1, 200,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her stock more crates of soda, beer, sugar, boxes of soap, cartons of salt,  water and fruit drinks for sale. Her challenges include high transport costs. Her dream is to expand her business and accumulate profits that will enable her to build more houses. She joined MCDT because she wanted funds to boost her business. She stays in her house with access to electricity and no piped water. Her major monthly expenses include power bills.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, crates of soda and beer, boxes of soap, cartons of salt, water and fruit drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru:
Мавчуда  57 лет, вдова, имеет 2 детей. Занимается торговлей детской одежды. Имеет 17 летний стаж в сфере торговли. Кредитуется в Арванде  2010 года. За все время сотрудничества с этой организацией ни разу не нарушала условия кредитования и показала себя с лучшей стороны. 

На полученный кредит хочет закупить новый ассортимент детской одежды и  увеличить свой товарооборот. Мавчуда хочет накопить деньги на предстоящую свадьбу своего младшего сына. Старшая дочь Мавчуды  замужем и живет отдельно с семьей мужа. Сын Мавчуды – таксист, занимается перевозкой пассажиров, он тоже всячески поддерживает мать. Мавчуда благодарна организации Арванд за финансовую помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Mavjuda is 57 years old and has two children.  She sells children's clothing and has seventeen years of experience in the trade.  She's been a borrower with MDO Arvand since 2010.  During her time with the organization, she has never violated the terms of service and has always put her best foot forward.  

With this loan, she hopes to purchase an assortment of children's clothing and increase her turnover.  Mavjuda wants to save money for the upcoming wedding of her son.  Mavjuda's elder daughter is married and lives separately with her husband's family.  Her son is a taxi driver, transporting passengers.  He is very supportive of his mother.  Mavjuda is grateful to Arvand for financial help and support.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing

loans.name: Jeanne D'arc Claire

texts.fr: Jeanne d'arc claire est une dame âgée de 54 ans, mariée et mère de 07 enfants. comme activité, elle dispose d'une vente à emporter dans un quartier de la ville de 05 ans environ. elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. elle voudrait avec ce crédit acheter 20 casiers de bières, 10 casiers de boissons gazeuses et quelques bouteilles de vins rouges pour renforcer son stock de marchandises afin de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. cela va également augmenter son chiffre d'affaire. les revenus générés lui permettront d'aider son mari à mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille. elle a comme ambitions pour son activité de faire dans la vente en gros des boissons.
texts.en: Jeanne d'Arc Claire is a woman of 54 years old. She is married and the mother of seven children. She has been running her takeaway shop in a neighborhood of her city for the past five years. She benefits from excellent experience in her field. Jeanne d'Arc Claire wants to use this loan to buy 20 crates of beer, 10 cases of soft drinks and a few bottles of red wine. This will allow her to increase her stock of merchandise in order to better meet customer demand. This loan will also allow her to increase the income she earns. The additional income generated will enable her to help her husband in better meeting the needs of their family. Jeanne d'Arc Claire hopes to someday become a bottled drink wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase beverages that she will sell in her takeaway shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise that he will resell in his shop.

loans.name: Nikoloz

texts.en: Nikoloz is 37 years old. He is unmarried and lives in the Tskaltubo District with his parents. Nikoloz is a fireman and gets a small monthly salary. The source of income for the family is the retirement pensions of Nikoloz’s parents. The family belongs to the vulnerable poor category. Since their income is not enough for the family's needs, Nikoloz decided to start up a new business. He went to a local credit agency to get money for this business start up, but without any success. His loan request was always rejected because of his low income and lack of experience in starting a new business. He received the loan in the framework of a start-up loan program that was initiated jointly by Credo and Kiva. This program aims at the provision of business start-up funds for the Georgian rural poor, who do not have access to regular credit products, as they live in poverty and are regarded as “borrowers with a high risk." With the requested credit, Nikoloz will purchase chickens and raise them. After 4-5 months, he will start to sell them. The hens will be sold on the open market in a nearby town by Nikoloz. He will reinvest the profit for the further expansion of the farm. Also, part of the profit will be used for purchasing some necessary household goods to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: To start up a poultry farm

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children and all of them attend school. She is not looking after any additional family members.

She has been selling green bananas from her home for 10 years, working seven days a week. She owns a bar as another source of income.

She has requested a loan of USHS 700,000 from MCDT-SACCO to enable her to buy more bunches of green bananas. Her challenges include seasonality and defaulters. Her dream is to become a wholesaler and also to start going to villages for green bananas. She joined MCDT because she wanted to improve her business. She stays in a rented house with access to both electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teófila, está solicitando un préstamo, porque necesita realizar la compra de ropa en variedad para la temporada de diciembre, invirtiendo en ropa interior femenina y masculina, blusas, faldas, y otro tipo de mercadería es necesario para darle movimiento negocio y satisfacer la demanda.

Con el préstamo anterior considera que ha aumentado el número de prendas de vestir en el negocio, ofreciendo una mejor variedad para poder aumentar sus ventas, gracias a esta inversión sus condiciones han mejorado en el comercio y en su familia
texts.en:
Teófila is requesting a loan because she needs to buy a variety of clothing for the December season. She will invest in men’s and women’s undergarments, blouses, skirts, and other types of merchandise that she needs to keep up with the turnover in her business and satisfy the demand.

With her previous loan, Teófila says that she increased the number of garments available in her business. By offering a better variety, she was able to increase her sales. Thanks to this investment, the conditions in her business and in her family’s living situation have improved.

loans.use: to buy undergarments, blouses, skirts, and other types of merchandise.

loans.name: Evan Bradley

texts.es:
Evan, vive con su esposa y un hijo, es una persona muy dedicada, es profesional en Laboratorio Clinico, tiene una clinica de laboratorio clínico, comenzó como ayudante luego que aprendió el proceso en la practica decidió instalar su propio laboratorio y tiene dos años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para comprarse materiales para realizar exámenes como son los químicos, éste prestamo le ayudara a mejorar el servicio los clientes teniendo materia prima para las diferentes chequeos que realiza y generar más ingresos para el hogar.

El objetivo de es ampliar los servicios que ofrece en el laboratorio, mejorar el local y mejorar vivienda.
texts.en:
Evan lives with his wife and child, and is a very devoted person. He is a Clinical Laboratory professional and has his own clinical laboratory. He started out as an assistant,  and once he had learned how to do the process in practice he decided to set up his own laboratory, and now has two years of experience.

He is requesting a loan to buy materials such as chemicals to carry out medical tests. This loan will help him to improve customer service, since he will have the raw materials he needs for the different tests he does, and to generate more income for his household. 

His aim is to increase the services that the laboratory offers, improve the premises and improve his home.

loans.use: to buy chemicals to carry out medical tests.

loans.name: Alcina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos todos vão a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais uma nora e um neto que vivem com ela.
É operário de fábrica e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar congelador e material eléctrico para a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é pagar devidamente o empréstimo para ter oportunidade de pedir mais.
texts.en:
Alcina is married and the mother of 5 children who all go to School. She lives in her own house with her family and supports a daughter-in-law and a grandson who live with her.

She work in a factory and with this loan she plans to buy a freezer and electrical goods for her home.

In future she intends to expand her house and furnish it. To this end she commits to duly paying off the loan so as to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to duly pay off her loan in order to have the opportunity to ask for more.

loans.use: buy a freezer and electrical goods for her home.

loans.name: Djèmanguelen Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre femmes du groupe Djèmanguelen sont mariées majoritairement dans des familles monogamiques avec en moyenne 51 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes au quartier  Ségou Coura dans la ville de Ségou et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage. Elles font l’achat et la vente du poisson, des calebasses, des céréales et des condiments. Dans le souci d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  avec qui, elles sont à leur 6ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Kadia  (femme en 1ème position sur la photo de la  droite vers la gauche)  est connue à Ségou Coura pour sa vente de poissons fumés et frais. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 60kg de poissons fumés. Elle se ravitaille en poisson à Markala. La revente se fait en détails, au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes. Avec ce prêt, Madame  Kadia  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de    20 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité afin d’augmenter son volume.
texts.en:
The four members of the Djèmanguelen group are married women, living mainly in monogamous families and averaging 51 years of age, with four children. They all live in the Ségou Coura district of the town of Ségou and know each other as neighbors. They buy and resell fish,  gourds, cereals and condiments. With the goal of bolstering their working capital, the group members have decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program and are now on their 6th solidarity loan.

Mrs. Kadia (the first one from the right to the left in the photo) is known in Ségou Coura as a vendor of smoked and fresh fish. She plans to use her loan to buy 60 kg of smoked fish. She stops up in Markala. She sells retail, for cash and on credit to a customer base composed mainly of women. With this loan, Mrs. Kadia hopes to achieve an average monthly revenue of 20,000 West African francs, which will be reinvested in her business in order to expand it.

loans.use: to buy smoked fish.

loans.name: Silvio Jose

texts.es:
Silvio, solicita un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en su negocio del cultivo de maíz, comprando aquellos materiales necesarios para que la producción sea más abundante y sana, por ejemplo el abono, semilla, pago de mozos para la preparación de la tierra, con esto estará en condiciones de poder iniciar su trabajo.

El considera que el préstamo anterior le ha permitido incrementar su inventario para poder tener una buena cosecha de la cual ha podido vender a muy buen precio, obteniendo un margen de ganancia para poder ayudar a su familia, hoy en día está realizando su cultivo en mayor número de manzanas de terreno con lo que espera tener más producción.
texts.en:
Silvio is applying for a new loan, so that he can invest in his business growing corn, buying the necessary materials so that production will be more abundant and healthy. For example, he will buy fertilizer, seeds, and also pay for the labor needed to prepare the land. With this, he will be in a position to start his work.

He considers that the previous loan has allowed him to increase his inventory of supplies, enabling him to have a good harvest that he has been able to sell at a very good price, obtaining a profit margin that enables him to help his family. Nowadays he is doing his farming on a greater number of manzanas (unit of land measurement), so he hopes to have more output.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and pay for labor to prepare the land.

loans.name: Claudia Mercedes

texts.es:
Claudia, esta soltera, no tiene hijos, vive con su madre y una hermana, ella realiza un cultivo agrícola, actualmente es empleada en un banco su familia se ha dedicado siempre al aspecto agrícola, luego de que ella terminara el estudio decidió ayudar a su padre realizando la producción en el cultivo de maíz y plátano, tiene a una persona que le administra la siembra desde hace un año.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar cepas de plátano y sembrarlas, tambien comprara abono, herbicidas y pago de mozo, que realice el trabajo, esto le ayudará a mejorar  la producción, pagando un empleado que cuida la plantación.

La aspiración de Claudia es mejorar el cultivo en las cosechas, también aspira terminar sus estudios de maestría en la Universidad y construir su propia familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is single, has no children, and lives with her mother and one of her sisters. She grows crops, and also works in a bank at the moment. Her family have always made a living farming. When Claudia completed her studies, she decided to help her father by growing corn and bananas. For a year she has been buying seeds from one person.

She is requesting a loan to buy banana plants and plant them, as well as fertilizer and pesticides. She also wants to pay for a helper to do the work. This will help her to improve yield, by paying a worker to look after the plantation.

Claudia's dream is to increase her crop production. She also hopes to finish her university master's degree, and have a family of her own.

loans.use: to buy banana plants and plant them, fertilizer, pesticides, and to pay for a helper.

loans.name: Keiry

texts.es:
La joven Keiry de 26 años de edad, vive con su esposo  en su casa de habitación,  tiene un hijo que depende de ella y de su esposo, se dedica desde hace 03  años al negocio de venta de ropa y calzado, vive en una  comunidad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras,  sus clientes son las personas que a diario le visitan en su negocio y amigos que llegan a visitarle y también con los maestros y empleados de bancos que son sus clientes.
Doña Keiry está solicitando el préstamo para compra de blusas, sandalias, pantalones, vestidos, calzonetas, faldas y zapato de mujer. Con el apoyo de este préstamo ella desea surtir su negocio y prepararse con mercadería para esta navidad, y con las ganancias desea mejorar mas su negocio y seguir invirtiendo en el para que sea mas grande cada día.
Doña Keiry su sueño es tener su casa propia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Young, 26-year-old Keiry lives with her husband in their home.  She has one son, who is dependent on her and her husband.  She has been working at her business selling clothing and shoes for three years.  She lives in a neighborhood of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras.  Her customers are the people who come to her business daily and friends who come to see her, as well as her teacher and bank employee customers.  

Keiry is asking for a loan to buy tops, sandals, pants, dresses, underwear, skirts, and women's shoes.  With the help of this loan, she wants to stock her business and prepare herself with merchandise for Christmas.  With her earnings, she wants to further improve her business and keep investing in it so it will get bigger every day.  

Keiry's dream is to own her own home.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to buy tops, sandals, pants, dresses, underwear, skirts, and women's shoes for her business.

loans.name: Leny Elizabeth

texts.es:
Lenny, necesita invertir para la temporada de diciembre, en la compra de carne, aceite, tomates, repollo, que son necesarios para la fabricación de las pupusas, esto le permitirá fortalecer el negocio y estar preparada para atender la demanda.

Ella considera que a través de los préstamos su negocio ha logrado crecer y mantener lo necesario para la producción, atendiendo un buen número de clientes, esto le ha generado mejoras económicas para cubrir la salud y alimentacion en toda su familia.
texts.en:
Lenny needs to invest in meat, oil, tomatoes, and cabbage for the December season, as these are necessary to make pupusas.  This will allow her to strengthen her business and be prepared to meet her demand.

She believes that it is through these loans that her business has been able to grow and have what it needs to stay in production, serving a good number of customers.  This has improved her finances so she can cover her entire family's health and food needs.

loans.use: to buy meat, oil, tomatoes, and cabbage

loans.name: Júlia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 6 filhos dos quais 3 vão a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É empregada doméstica. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, barrotes, ferro, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e mobilar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos e o pagamento devido do empréstimo
texts.en:
Júlia is single and the mother of 6 children, 3 of whom attend School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a domestic cleaner. With this loan she plans to buy construction material (cement, metal sheets, beams, iron and others) to continue the building work on her house.

In future she hopes to complete her house and furnish it.  To this end she commits to duly paying off the loan so as to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds and the payment due for the loan.

loans.use: buy construction material (cement, metal sheets, beams, iron and others) to continue the building work on her house.

loans.name: Rosa Isabel

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene 36 años de edad, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 15 años, su esposo se dedica a la pesca junto con su hijo, ella se dedica se dedica a la venta de ropa, para dama y para caballeros y niños, trabajando de lunes a sábado, realizar las ventas en algunas islas de la zona costera y tiene siete años de estar en esta actividad.

Ella está solicitando un préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio aumentando los productos en prendas de vestir para damas y caballeros y niños como blusas, faldas, vestidos, ropa interior, pantalones, camisas, que son necesarios y que le ayudarán a incrementar el inventario para poder satisfacer la demanda.

Considera que su objetivo primordial, es que el negocio esté fortalecido en prendas de vestir ya que esto le permite tener mejor ganancia para ofrecerle a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and her 15 year old son. Her husband and son work together as fishermen. Rosa sells women’s, men’s and children’s clothes. She works Monday to Saturday. She sells on some of the islands of the coastal region, and has been doing this for seven years.

Rosa is applying for a loan in order to be able to invest into her business, increasing her stock of garments for women, men and children. This is necessary, and will help her to increase her inventory, in order to be able to satisfy demand. 

Rosa considers her main objective to be the strengthening her business with a greater selection of garments, so that she can make more profit to give to her family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, dresses, underwear, trousers, shirts.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, necesita invertir en un nuevo cultivo, y para esto quiere un financiamiento que le permita pagar el alquiler del terreno donde realizará la siembra, que son tres manzanas de terreno, con esto logrará prepararse para realizar la siembra.

El considera que la producción de granos básicos y sus ingresos han mejorado a través del financiamiento anterior, ya que se ha comprado los productos necesarios para poder fortalecer la siembra, los créditos le dan una mayor seguridad para mantener las condiciones económicas a su  grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Pedro needs to invest in a new crop, and for this wants a loan that allows him to pay the rent on the land he farms, which is three manzanas in area (Central American unit of land measurement). With this, he will be ready to do his planting.

He considers that his output of staple grains, as well as his income, have improved through the previous loan, as he has bought the necessary products for strengthening his crop.

The loans have given him greater security for maintaining his family's financial situation.

loans.use: To rent the land where he will grows his crop.

loans.name: Leydin Yadira

texts.es:
Leydin, quiere incrementar el negocio y las ventas para la temporada de diciembre, solicita un préstamo para la compra de blusas, faldas, camisas, pantalones, que son la mercadería que normalmente ofrecen los clientes y es de su agrado.

Este préstamo le dará nuevamente los recursos necesarios para aumentar el negocio, ella considera que a través de esta ayuda ha logrado permanecer en el mercado teniendo un ingreso permanente para su familia, y que el negocio este surtido.
texts.en:
Leydin wants to grow her business and her sales for the December season.  She is asking for a loan to buy tops, skirts, shirts, and pants, which are the merchandise she normally offers her customers and which they like.

This loan will once again give her the resources she needs to grow her business.  She believes that this help has allowed her to remain in the market, have a permanent source of income for her family, and keep her business stocked.

loans.use: to buy tops, skirts, shirts, and pants

loans.name: Edwin Gabriel

texts.es:
Edwin, solicita un préstamo para poder invertir en la producción de granos basicos, pagando la mano de obra para sacar el maíz y también pagando una máquina desgranadora, en la cual estará preparando la cosecha para alimentación y para la venta. Este préstamo le dará lo necesario en recursos económicos para que realice el trabajo final de la siembra.
El considera que sus cosechas han aumentado a través de los préstamos que utiliza, comprando los recursos necesarios, sus ganancias también han sido mejor con las que ha podido comprar el alimento, vestuario y pago de salud, para su hijo y esposa, sus condiciones están mejorando.
texts.en:
Edwin is requesting a loan to invest in growing staple grains by paying for labor to pick the corn and also by buying a machine to separate the kernels, which he will use to prepare his harvest to be eaten and sold.  This loan will give him the financial resources he needs to carry out the final stage of work on his crop.

He believes that his harvests have increased through his use of these loans, as he has been buying the resources he needs.  His earnings have also improved, which has allowed him to pay for food, clothing, and health costs for his son and wife, thereby improving their conditions.

loans.use: to pay for labor to pick his corn and to buy a machine to separate the kernels

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en: Laurence is 25 years old. She owns a boutique and has been selling foodstuffs for the past four years. She has requested a loan to buy more rice, salt and cooking oil. With the profits from the business, she plans and dreams to build a house in the future.

loans.use: To pay for rice, cooking oil, and salt for sale.

loans.name: German David

texts.es:
Germán, vive con su esposa no tiene hijos, él se dedica a la comercialización de mariscos este negocio lo aprendió en su familia y la ventaja es que cuenta con un equipo de trabajo, con el que logra pescar el producto, su dificultad en ello son las mareas que afectan la pesca.

El esta solicitando el préstamo el cual utilizará en la compra de conchas al por mayor, estas las comercializará con la intención de obtener un margen de ganancia, el beneficio del préstamo será que Germán cuente con el dinero para hacer la compra al contado y obtener a mejor precio del producto.
La aspiración del él es poder comprarse un motor de lancha y también una lancha que le ayudaría aún más para realizar la pesca, para tener una mejor vida .
texts.en:
Germán lives with his wife.  He has no children.  He makes a living selling shellfish.  He learned this business from his family and the advantage is that he has work equipment with which he fishes.  The trouble is the tides that affect the fishing.

He's requesting a loan to buy scallops wholesale.  He'll sell them with the goal of getting a profit margin.  The benefit of the loan will be that Germán will have the money to make the purchase in cash and get a better price for the product.

His goal is to be able to buy himself a motor and also a boat to help him even more when he fishes, so he has a better life.

loans.use: to buy scallops wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothing as well as cheese and cream

loans.name: Karen Suyapa

texts.es:
La señora  Karen de 30 años de edad es casada vive, con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una casa que ellos rentan, se dedica desde hace 03 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería, su negocio está ubicado en una comunidad San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante.
